18.18: ninb yem Fav zu'g zung pia'g Mwavj ka'Euad, se zu'g zung Zwrtq yaavb ken.
18.3: weig haiq tiug funj yia Bua Navq scvb Kuq? ziuj meib mavg, yia Bua penj ka'naaib Vovj fai?
18.8: ninb kanb Eei zauj txb ninb mivb zu'g muvd Reng, ninb yavb zcv Laav Eei Kwrtq Jiaj.
18.19: yem ninb Eei trub zov maiq maaib ninb Eei hod txig zeib fun. ninb yem Jiaj Eei txvj maiq maaib yetg taub Zwrtq sivj mcvg.
18.9: Laav zyrug Lopq Jyenq ninb Eei zaub Go, cvj nc'g Jyenq zyetg Eei.
18.7: ninb henq Eei zaub Biag ib zang laamj tu'q navq. ninb kanb taaq Eei za'eij zuvq hxig ninb Di'q zu'g Dxpg.
18.5: “x'q myenb Eei Fav zuvq zu'g Navq tav nx taig mig a'q. ninb Eei trub Byetg yaag maiq ziuj Fav.
18.16: ninb Eei Ruvb Gaai mivb, ninb Eei Gwaab Eauj Revg.
18.20: fai puv myenb mwavj haid ninb Eei setq mweid zu'g Eei sig zyrug Hruq waaig Revg. tov puv myenb yaag kamb Riaj haig a'q.
18.17: yem luvb Diaq maiq maaib haiq taub Javj ninb, yem teib puv ninb Eei Buaj zutg mig a'q.
18.14: yem ninb Kauj Eei Dopg liub ninb zu'g pcv Zwrtq, cvj zu'g txb mivb Tauj kamb Riaj haig Eei huvb tiaj.
18.4: meib Qiaj Jiad hxig kanb mun Eei myenb aa'b! Daub peib laaij meib xij zu'g kwavg penj Daub Waav fai? la'pyeiq xij zu'g swiq Gxi ninb Eei txvj fai?
18.21: x'q myenb yem Eei txvj zuvq Navq naaiq. maiq hiuq Tinb huvb Eei myenb yaag Navq naaiq a'q.”
18.2: “meib xij kxvq naaiq kxvq uaq Dovg haaij laub? Namq lovj maa'b! yia Bua zyrug Zauj meib kxvq waag.
18.6: yem ninb Eei Dopg liub Eei Fav penj Mwavj, yem ninb kub vwaaig Eei tav yaag taig mig a'q.
18.13: ninb Eei Dopq putq Zyruq Eei pcvg huq Revg. to'g haig Eei wrnb pcvg na'q ninb Eei puab zauj.
18.12: laaij vxg, ninb Eei Qa'q Piaj Jyenq Fiag. ze'g naang yem ninb Eei ka'Len zuaq Jyenq ninb.
18.15: tovb maiq zeid ninb Eei ka'naaiq yem ninb Eei Dopg liub, yaag maaib huvb Yaamj Jyenq ninb yem Eei txvj.
18.11: hc'q ninb kamb Riaj haig Eei sig weib Jyenq pyei puv, yaag zung Jyenq ninb Eei zaub Go mivb.
18.10: maaib Laav weig ninb pivj Jyenq ka'Diaq Dau, zcv Jyenq yem ninb yavb Eei Jauq.

8.18: mq paag sij kxvq ninb yem uaq nxm txvj zu'g pcv Zwrtq, uaq nxm txvj zyrug maiq Eyemg ninb cvj kxvq, ‘yia zuvq maiq pwatg Jiaj meib.’
8.8: “yia Toq meib, naaig lob Nxi myenb yaag Namq mavg kaaj ovb Taaij Bua lxd pwatg haiq Euvg,
8.3: Tinb huvb haib zruj pcvb fim Eei Jauq Pyen fai? fai nrnb Jiaj uaq taub haib pun zruj hxpg Eei Jauq Pyen mivb fai?
8.21: ninb xij pun meib Eei Rwib cvj a'Neiq Eei Jyetq, yaag pun meib Eei Rwib Fyenb yrub Eei heug.
8.14: ninb Kauj Eei Jauq tavj mig a'q. ninb Kauj Eei se Navq kcvb Exg Byxvd nx.
8.6: sij kxvq meib Zivb Revg, Hruq zivj Eei, ninb zuvq xij weig meib Jiad taaib, cvj pun meib Eei Jaab tivb Rwrnj taaib Navq lod uaq nx.
8.2: “naaiq teij waag meib xij kxvq Tauj haiq zang? meib Eei waag Navq Ryaauj pwrng nx.
8.20: “mavg maa'b! Tinb huvb zuvq maiq kwavg maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei myenb. yaag maiq Tevj zruj x'q Eei myenb.
8.7: maiq kunq meib Jiad kxn uaq zang meib faij Eei, setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g meib zyrug tu'q zruj Lo.
8.19: mavg maa'b! naaiq se ninb Eei Jauq Eei Fyenb yrub. kanb teij myenb xij yem uaq Dau Zwrtq taaib.
8.17: ninb Eei Ruvb Reng Jyenq la'pyeiq, cvj Fiag mivb pia'g la'pyeib Qavj.
8.11: maiq maaib Faavb, Ziab txij yenb miaq haib Zwrtq Eei fai? maiq maaib uam, lua'g ti'g haib Yaavj Eei fai?
8.5: sij kxvq meib Jyenb lxd Tinb huvb yaag Jrub nrnb Jiaj uaq taub,
8.9: weig zu'g yia Bua a'Nxi Ko'q ho'g Zwrtq seij, maiq hiuq haiq Euvg. yia Bua yaag yem paamb ken Navq tovb linb nx.
8.16: ninb se Navq miaq, Eutg Fav Eei zyavb hog Yaavj taaib, ninb Eei lwavb lrug pwavq ninb Eei Wivj.
8.4: sij kxvq meib Eei fu'Jweiq paamd zwid txvg Tinb huvb, ninb ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei sig pun ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid.
8.10: ninb Bua xij Faauj meib, Buaj meib, ziuj ninb Bua mevb pc'g kxvq Zwrtq maiq zeid?
8.22: Rxv meib uaq teij xij zu'g paaig Myen Eaiq, x'q myenb Eei Dopg liub yavb naaiq Jiaj maiq maaib a'q.”
8.12: Zxg mcv Eei zyavb hog maiq kaatq nx, peiq kanb Euvg miaq, ninb Gaai Daavg Jiaj.
8.15: ninb pavg ninb Eei pyauq, mq paag pyauq yem maiq Jyenq. ninb nanq Jyenq pyauq mq paag pyauq maiq wrnq.
8.13: ta'faanb la'Ku'q Tinb huvb Eei myenb yaag Navq uaq nx. maiq kan Tinb huvb Eei myenb maaib lamb Namq Eei, zuvq xij zu'g myetg.

33.18: ninb tavq Jyenq pun myenb maiq zu'g pia'g yemb ken, Fruj ninb Bua Eei mcvg maiq zu'g taig.
33.8: “meib kxvq Eei waag yia haid mig a'q. meib kxvq waag Eei Qiaj pia'g yia Eei mnxmb.
33.33: sij kxvq meib maiq kxvq, Toq mwavj yia kxvq. maiq tuvq Ko lo, yia zyrug zx'q Zovb mevb Eei Jauq Faauj meib.”
33.3: yia Eei waag pun Ziv yia Eei Hruq zivj, ziuj yia hiuq Eei Jauq yia Eei Rwib meij kxvq.
33.32: sij kxvq meib maaib waag kxvq, tau yia maa'b! kunq kxvq a'q. yia a'Neiq mwavj weig lcvd meib se maiq txvg.
33.21: ninb Jaig kau, sin zavg so'q Revg, mavg maiq pwatg xq, zinb Daavg maiq pwatg Eei Buvq, ib zang Bov Zwrtq taaib a'q.
33.14: Tinb huvb lovg naaiq Euvg za'eij kxvq, lovg uaq Euvg za'eij kxvq, mq paag myenb maiq lovg Hruq mwavj.
33.23: “sij kxvq maaib taub finb myenb taaib Tevj ninb zruj Bu'Dovj myenb, se Zinb waang taub Eei yetg taub, pun myenb hiuq tu'q zruj hxpg Eei Jauq.
33.6: ziuj Tinb huvb mavg, yia Zauj meib fib Navq, ninb yaag lovg Dunb nia zeij yia taaib fib Navq Eei.
33.2: mavg maa'b! ib zang yia xij kxvq, yia liug leid zyavj kxvq a'q.
33.20: ninb Eei Rwib zyrug yruj Eang hopq, lyemb Kuq Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq yaag yruj mig a'q.
33.24: uaq taub finb myenb Kxb lyenb ninb zyrug kxvq, ‘Toq Fruj ninb, maiq tuvq pun ninb mivb yemb ken, yia lxd tu'q zua'g Eei Jaaj mig a'q.’
33.28: ninb Fruj yia, pun yia maiq zu'g Fiag Tauj yemb ken, yia Eei mcvg zyrug tu'q pwatg Fav.’
33.7: weig naaiq meib maiq zu'g kamb Riaj yia, yia maiq zeid xij lovg Qa'q zatq Jyenq meib.
33.29: “Tinb huvb zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig pun myenb, i Rung, pua Rung.
33.19: “myenb yaag zu'g Bx'q Faauj pweij Jyenq Zruj tiaq mun, ninb Eei Buvq yaag zanb zang mun.
33.17: weig pun myenb leib Gxi zruj x'q Eei sig, yaag pun ninb Bua maiq Zevb Lo zruj mauj.
33.31: “o yopq aag, pcv mnxmb mwavj yia kxvq og. Toq maiq tuvq Ko lo, yia zyrug kxvq.
33.30: ninb Fruj myenb leib Dutq yemb ken, pun ninb tu'q a'Neiq Eei zyavb Jyenq.
33.27: ninb yem myenb Eei Ra'Myen paauj Ruv kxvq, ‘yia paamd zwid, pwatg zruj txvg Eei sig penj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq. mq paag Tinb huvb maiq ziuj yia zruj Eei winb pun yia.
33.11: ninb zx'q Dyavj kapg Jyenq yia Eei zauj, cvj zuaq Jyenq yia Eei tiub tiub Jauq.’
33.5: sij kxvq meib haib tau yia, tau maa'b! liug leid zyavj meib Eei waag yaag sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.
33.9: meib kxvq, ‘yia se Zivb Revg, maiq maaib zwid. yia Zivb Revg Eei, maiq txvg haiq Euvg.
33.16: Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua Eei mnxmb mwavj tu'q haid, yaag lovg tonq Eei waag hc'q ninb Bua.
33.4: Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb zeij yia, nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Eei Qiaj pun yia maaib mcvg.
33.10: mq paag Tinb huvb lxd sig hxig yia, yaag funj yia penj ninb Eei winb wavq.
33.22: ninb Eei livb wrnb Tauj fatq yemb ken, ninb Eei mcvg Tauj fatq myetg mcvg uaq teij.
33.12: “yopq aag, Navq naaig meib txvg mig a'q. yia xij tau meib. Tinb huvb se kaub Lo Jiaj paamb myenb.
33.15: luvb mwrnd zang myenb pweij Jyenq Zruj, mFxmb Do Eei zyavb hog, Beij Beij, pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig,
33.13: meib weig haiq tiug Zauj ninb Rcv kxvq, ‘ninb maiq tau yia Eei haiq Jruj waag’?
33.1: “yopq aag, ib zang Toq mwavj yia kxvq, mwavj lovj yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag.
33.26: ninb tauj kauj Jrub Tinb huvb, Tinb huvb zyrug zipq ninb, ninb Fyenb yrub Eei mivb yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen. Tinb huvb cvj pun ninb Rwrnj taaib zruj Kuq myenb Navq lod uaq nx.
33.25: ninb Eei sin zyrug Rwrnj lunj taaib Navq fu'Jweiq Eei, yaag henq Jiad taaib Navq myenb lunj myenb Eei Nxib Eia'g nx.

3.18: yem uaq zu'g wrnj Eei myenb tu'q lomb Rxib henb, mwavj maiq haid aapq ninb Bua zruj kov uaq teij Eei Qiaj Bwi.
3.8: Toq pun haib zyruj Nxi Eei myenb zyruj uaq Nxi, se maaib panb zeig tovd le-wi-aa-Taan Jiad taaib uaq teij.
3.3: “Toq pun yia Zwrtq seij Eei Nxi Zauj ninb Bua kxvq, ‘maaib kub vwaab txn Zwrtq seij’ uaq mwrnd zu'g myetg.
3.21: ninb Bua zuaq Jyenq taig, mq paag maiq tu'q taig. ninb Bua lxd taig Eei Jauq kaub Zamq lxd pivj Jyenq Eei zinb zxib.
3.14: Zauj luvb Diaq Eei huvb tiaj Zauj Zaavb laavb Eei myenb yem, tovb weig kanb Zeij Jiad ib zang Baav waaig Eei txvj,
3.23: Tinb huvb pivj Jyenq myenb hod Gaav Eei Jauq, puvb puv weib Jyenq ninb Bua.
3.6: Toq pun uaq mwrnd mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei, zx'q Gxi, maiq tuvq pun Havj maaib uaq nxm Nxi, yaag maiq tuvq pun uaq nxm Nxi pia'g Laaj Eei sruj mrug.
3.20: “weig haiq tiug Zeij Fav pun zu'g syrug Kruq Eei myenb? weig haiq tiug pun Raub Kruq Eei myenb maaib mcvg zyavb?
3.24: yia Tauq Qiab Do'g txvj Eang Naavj, yia Funb Eei Qiaj toj Zwrtq Navq uam nx.
3.7: Toq pun uaq mwrnd maiq maaib scvb yuvd, pun uaq mwrnd Eei zyavb hog yaag maiq haid Fyenb yrub heug Eei Qiaj Bwi.
3.19: Lob Lo faib faij Eei myenb yem naaig, zruj nrub Eei myenb pyauj Dutq ninb Eei zyruq.
3.17: yem naaig x'q myenb tivb Fiag, maiq zruj x'q, Kruq Eei myenb tu'q hitq Kwrnj.
3.11: “yia Zwrtq seij uaq zang, yia weig haiq tiug maiq taig? yia Zwrtq maa Eei ka'sia, weig haiq tiug maiq tavj Qiaj?
3.5: Toq pun uaq Nxi mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj, pun Bwrnb hod Txvq Jyenq, Toq pun uaq nxm Nxi mapq mcvb Eei zyrug hivb Revg Fav.
3.9: Toq pun uaq Dxm Eei Taaib pc'g fiv Mwavj mivb, pun uaq mwrnd Namq Jyenq haib Fav mq paag maiq Fav, maiq tu'q pwatg luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei Fav,
3.16: fai yia weig haiq tiug maiq Navq Baav waaig Eei kub vwaad pyopq Jyenq, se Navq maiq pwatg Jiaj Fav Eei kub vwaad.
3.4: Toq pun uaq Nxi Mwavj mivb. Toq pun kub vwaaig Eei Tinb huvb maiq lxd uaq nxm Nxi, yaag maiq tuvq pun Fav ziuj zu'g.
3.10: weig zu'g uaq mwrnd pun yia Zwrtq seij, pun yia zu'g ziaj Euvg Kruq naang hxig.
3.22: ninb Bua zuaq Jyenq taig pia'g zruq zyrug a'Neiq, za'kevb! Fyenb yrub Tauj taaub.
3.12: weig haiq tiug maaib Zivb Bx'g zipq yia? fai maa pun ninb Eei Exj yia hopq?
3.15: fai Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb yem, tovb pun ninb Bua Eei pyauq maaib Jyem Eaanb pwavq.
3.13: maiq Navq naaig yia tu'q pweij Fiag sekq zia'g. yia taig zyrug tu'q hitq Kwrnj,
3.1: Ga'haaq yopq Gxi Rwib zyruj ninb Eei Zwrtq seij Nxi.
3.26: yia maiq maaib pcvb xn, yaag maiq tu'q sekq. yia maiq tu'q hitq Kwrnj, mq paag Kruq naang taaib lxd yia.”
3.25: weig zu'g yia kamb Riaj Eei sig zuvq zu'g yia mig a'q. tovb yia kamb Riaj Jiaj Eei sig Dxtq zu'g yia.

32.18: weig zu'g yia maaib waag Zamq, Eyend maiq Jyenq, yia Eei Hruq aapq yia kxvq.
32.8: nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb Eei Qiaj pun paamb myenb Eei Hruq maaib panb zeig haib mevb pc'g.
32.3: ninb yaag Qiaj Jiad yopq Eei pua taub txig, weig zu'g ninb Bua lxd maiq tu'q waag tau, maiq kunq ninb Bua kxvq yopq txvg.
32.21: yia maiq mavg haiq taub Eei Myen, maiq la'kwaib Zev haiq taub.
32.14: yopq maiq zeid zweib yetq zweib Eeig txij yia kxvq, yia zuvq maiq lovg waag Navq meib Bua nx tau.
32.6: Bu-si myenb, Baa-laa-Ken Eei txn, e-li-hu, zyrug tau, “yia Havb Jeiq lunj, meib Bua koj. weig naaiq yia taamq faij, maiq kaamq kxvq yia Namq Zwrtq Eei waag pun meib Bua mwavj.
32.2: mq paag maaib taub laam fivj, Bu-si myenb, Baa-laa-Ken Eei txn, e-li-hu, Qiaj Jiad. ninb Qiaj Jiad yopq weig zu'g yopq kxvq ninb kanb zruj tu'q hxpg, maiq zeid Tinb huvb.
32.20: yia Navq haaij xij zu'g kxvq Zivj tu'q Kub yem, yia xij zu'g mxvj Gxi Rwib tau.
32.7: yia kxvq, ‘Havb Jeiq koj xij zu'g kxvq, pun syrug Ewrnb Daauq Eei lovg Zovb mevb Faauj myenb.’
32.19: yia Eei Hruq Navq a'vung tiuq tapq Bua'g, maiq maaib txvj pun Qiaj Zwrtq. yaag Navq syavb Dopg Bua'g haib zuvj Baaij.
32.17: yia kanb yaag xij tau, yia xij ziuj yia Namq Eei Jauq kxvq.
32.11: “yia zuaq Jyenq mwavj meib Bua kxvq Eei waag. yia mwavj meib Bua Namq Zwrtq Eei za'eij, yaag zuaq Jyenq meib Bua lxd waag kxvq.
32.5: e-li-hu pwatg naaiq teij pua laanb myenb maiq maaib waag tau ninb zyrug Qiaj Jiad haig.
32.9: se maiq zeid laaij Havb Jeiq Lav, myenb Zivj maaib Zovb mevb, fai syrug Ewrnb Daauq Zivj pun ninb Bua mevb pc'g haiq Euvg se hxpg.
32.16: ninb Bua maiq kxvq waag, yia Zxg xij zu'g zuaq fai? weig zu'g ninb Bua sruq Jyenq uaq, yaag maiq maaib waag cvj tau.
32.4: e-li-hu zuaq Jyenq xij Zauj yopq kxvq weig zu'g uaq teij kaub koj ninb.
32.10: weig naaiq yia kxvq. mwavj yia maa'b! Toq pun yia ziuj yia Eei Hruq Namq Eei kxvq.
32.22: weig zu'g yia maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx la'kwaib Zev, sij kxvq yia la'kwaib Zev, zeij yia uaq taub xij syepg syepq Eei myetg yia.
32.12: yia lovg Hruq mwavj meib Bua, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub tau tu'q hxpg yopq. meib Bua maiq maaib yetg laanb haib tau yopq Rcv Eei waag.
32.15: “ninb Bua kamb Riaj, maiq cvj tau a'q, zuvq maiq maaib waag tau.
32.13: faij fim, maiq tuvq kxvq, ‘yia Bua lxd tu'q Zovb mevb. pun Tinb huvb kanb tau ninb, maiq zeid myenb.’
32.1: naaiq teij pua laanb myenb zyrug tivb Fiag, maiq tau yopq, weig zu'g ziuj yopq mavg, ninb kanb zruj Kuq myenb.

21.18: ninb Bua Navq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Eei Byaub Gaauq, yaag Navq Bia'q nx, zu'g tomb Ryaauj pwrng Dovg haaij ma'g?
21.8: ninb Bua Eei txnb Jweiq txv Jyenq ninb Bua lyepg wrnq, ninb Bua Eei mziv tu'q pwatg ninb Bua Eei funb fa'q Lo taaib.
21.33: weig ninb uaq nxm hxvd Eei nia hev Eei. zwavj myenb kan Jyenq ninb mivb, mivb Daavg Eei myenb saauq maiq hivb.
21.3: Toq tiaq Jyenq mwavj yia kxvq. yia kxvq liud sweib meib Bua Jyetq a'q.
21.32: kcv ninb mivb Tauj zruq uaq zang, zuvq maaib myenb zuaq Jyenq ninb Eei zruq a'q.
21.21: ninb zyavb Eei Laab Eia'g pwavq, ninb Zxg haib Javj kanb Eei Mwavq txig fai?
21.14: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, ‘leib Gxi yia Bua maa'b! yia Bua maiq xij hiuq meib Eei Jaub lrug.
21.23: maaib laanb myenb taig Eei zyavb hog, sin zavg wavg syavj, henq Eei, Kub yem, pcvb xn Eei.
21.6: yia haiq zang Javj Tauj, kamb Riaj kau, zyavb sin zinj Revg a'q.
21.34: “meib Bua ni? meib Bua Kuvj Namq lovg Kuvb waag xn yia Eei Hruq? meib Bua tau Eei waag maiq maaib haiq Euvg Zwrtq liud Duaq myenb Eei waag.”
21.2: “Toq meib Bua lovb lovj Eei mwavj yia Eei waag, Navq naaig meib Bua zyrug xn yia Eei Hruq.
21.20: Toq pun ninb Bua kanb Eei mziv pwatg ninb Bua kanb zu'g myetg. pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Qiaj Jiad haig ninb Bua.
21.24: ninb Eei sin henq, Din Eei, ninb Eei Buvb fim Eyemd Eei.
21.28: weig zu'g meib Bua kxvq, ‘zruj Lo uaq taub Eei pyauq ib zang yem haaij? x'q myenb yem Jiaj Eei Dopg liub yem haaij?’
21.7: “Tinb huvb weig haiq tiug pun x'q myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq, tu'q syrug Ewrnb Daauq, maaib Qa'q henq Jyenq faauj?
21.29: meib Bua maiq tu'q naaig Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb fai? meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj Eei zxvb zevj,
21.19: meib Bua kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb syru Jyenq x'q myenb Eei zwid weig pun ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq zu'g tivg.’ Toq Tinb huvb winb pun x'q myenb kanb, weig pun ninb Bua kanb hiuq.
21.17: “x'q myenb Eei tav zu'g taig Dovg haaij ma'g? ninb Bua zu'g Kwrnj naanb Eei sig Dovg haaij ma'g? ninb Bua zu'g Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad, pun ze'g naang ninb Bua Dovg haaij ma'g?
21.31: haiq taub txv Jyenq x'q myenb kxvq ninb? ziuj ninb zruj Eei haiq taub winb pun ninb?
21.30: se zu'g ze'g naang Eei Nxi x'q myenb tu'q Fruj, Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad Eei Nxi yaag tu'q pyauj Dutq.
21.27: “yia hiuq tu'q meib Bua Eei Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq, Zauj meib Bua taaq maiq penj Eei za'eij hxig yia.
21.11: ninb Bua pun ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweib faij Zwrtq Navq pa'ki yuvb kwanb, ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud Zavj heij.
21.5: mavg yia maa'b! zyrug hc'q meib Bua kamb Riaj, yaag lovg puad pwav Jyenq Rwib.
21.9: ninb Bua Eei pyauq pcvb xn Eei, maiq zu'g kamb Riaj Eei sig. Tinb huvb Eei pyaaq yaag maiq Bx'q ninb Bua.
21.16: ninb Bua tu'q lovj se ninb Bua Kauj ninb Bua kanb Eei Qa'q. x'q myenb Zaavb laavb Eei za'eij yia simq Gxi.
21.4: “yia c'q, yia maiq zeid Zauj paamb myenb Rcv. uaq Euvg yia weig haiq tiug maiq zu'g Hruq pe'q?
21.10: ninb Bua Eei vovb kruq trug pwrnq maiq tavj, vovb Eeid Fiag txn, txn yaag maiq Baav.
21.22: “maaib haiq taub haib zx'q wrnb zaav Faauj Tinb huvb? weig zu'g ninb zuvq syemq yem Lav uaq teij.
21.12: ninb Bua kan Rod Zauj taanb paab Eei Qiaj paauj Ruv, cvj lovg Laub Dovb nuj Eei Qiaj zruj naug Eitg.
21.15: nrnb Jiaj uaq taub se haiq taub, yia Bua Zivj taaib xij zu'g fub suj ninb? sij kxvq yia Bua Jrub ninb yia Bua tu'q haiq Euvg lovj?’
21.13: ninb Bua yem seij zavg Eei Nxib Eia'g tu'q lovj, ninb Bua pcvb xn Eei Fiag yemb ken.
21.26: ninb Bua fib Navq Eei taig, pweij Jyenq niab Buv ka'Euad, maaib kcvb mau pwav Jyenq ninb Bua.
21.25: cvj maaib laanb myenb taig Eei zyavb hog, Hruq maiq maaib yetg teij xnb lx'g. zyavb seij maiq tu'q haiq Euvg lovj.

35.3: meib Zivj taaib naaig Tinb huvb, ‘yia tu'q haiq Euvg lovj? yia maiq paamd zwid yia tu'q haiq Euvg kaub lovj paamd zwid uaq teij?’
35.8: meib zruj x'q sig Kuvj hxig paamb myenb Navq meib nx. meib zruj Kuq myenb Kuvj Tevj paamb myenb tu'q lovj.

35.5: “Zau Myen mavg uaq luvb! mavg yem meib kub vwaaig Lav Eei Bwrnj.
35.16: weig naaiq yopq kxvq Jyenq maiq lamb lovg Eei waag mivb, kxvq waag Zamq yaag maiq hiuq ninb kxvq haiq Euvg.”
35.14: “uaq Euvg, meib kxvq meib mavg maiq pwatg Tinb huvb, ninb zyrug kaub fatq maiq xij mavg meib. meib yaag kxvq meib Eei sig yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen, meib yaag zuaq Jyenq ninb.
35.4: “yia xij tau meib yaag tau Zauj meib yem Eei lob kcv txig.
35.2: “meib Namq taaib naaiq se pcvb fim Eei fai? meib kxvq, ‘yia kaub pcvb fim Tinb huvb?’
35.6: sij kxvq meib paamd zwid, meib zruj haiq Euvg hxig Tinb huvb? sij kxvq meib txvg zwid Zamq Jyenq faauj, meib Eei zwid Navq haiq nx zruj pun ninb?
35.13: ninb Bua pc'g pc'g heug, Tinb huvb zuvq maiq mwavj. nrnb Jiaj uaq taub maiq kwen maiq sig Eei.
35.12: ninb Bua heug Jyenq Toq Tevj mq paag Tinb huvb maiq tau, weig zu'g x'q myenb mauj haig.
35.15: ib zang meib Namq taaib, maiq kunq Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad, ninb maiq tivg zwid, myenb paamd zwid ninb maiq kunq a'q.
35.11: ninb Faauj yia Bua kaub Zamq Faauj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib, yaag pun yia Bua maaib Zovb mevb kaub Zamq yem luvb Eei nx'g.’
35.10: mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub kxvq, ‘zeij yia taaib uaq taub Tinb huvb, se pun myenb luvb mwrnd zang paauj Ruv uaq taub, yem haaij?

40.18: ninb Eei Buvq Navq tovb si'q Dovb, ninb Eei puab zauj Navq Lia'g pyaaq.

40.3: yopq zyrug tau zyruq. ninb kxvq,
40.21: ninb pweij Fiag Dyavb Fimq ka'Diaq, yem Faavb Eei lua'g ti'g lomg ka'Euad.
40.14: Navq naaig yia zyrug Eyemg pun meib, meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad haib Fruj tu'q kanb.
40.23: maiq kunq uam seij, ninb maiq kamb Riaj, maiq kunq Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei uam Zovj zu'g ninb Eei Rwib pcvj, ninb yaag maiq Waav.
40.6: uaq zang zyruq yem Ryaaub zung tau yopq Eei waag. ninb kxvq,
40.2: “yopq aa'b! taanb Eei myenb xij Zauj nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Rcv Eei fai? Zauj Tinb huvb Rcv Eei myenb tau ninb maa'b!”
40.20: zwavj Bov Zwrtq Eang Eei ka'naaiq pun ninb, penj yetg zuvq Yiab zxib Ryaaug Eei txvj.
40.24: haiq taub haib pwav Jyenq ninb Eei mziv zx'q ninb? haiq taub haib zx'q ninb cvj Zunj Tov ninb Eei Ba'zxv?
40.7: “meib xij zu'g liug leid zyavj Navq Junb zeiq myenb nx. yia xij naaig meib, meib xij zu'g tau yia.
40.19: ninb se Tinb huvb zeij taaib Eei ta'yetq taub, Kuvj zeij ninb taaib uaq taub haib hivb ninb.
40.17: ninb pun ninb Eei tweiq vcvg Navq sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, ninb Eei Zamb zwib Eei Jaan Zi'q Jyenq Jaaj.
40.11: zruj mauj Eei myenb meib Qiaj Jiad, nrud haig, kunq zatq ninb Bua Fiag aiq.
40.5: yia kxvq Rung liud, yia zyrug maiq tau, kxvq i Rung, yia zyrug maiq cvj Jaa kxvq a'q.”
40.9: meib maaib puad Navq Tinb huvb Eei puad henq fai? meib maaib Qiaj Domb Domb Eei Bwi Navq ninb Eei Qiaj Bwi fai?
40.16: ninb Eei Qa'q yem ninb Eei Jaaiq, ninb Eei ka'sia Eei xq yaag maaib Qa'q henq.
40.4: “zyruq aag, yia se zyavb maiq penj haiq Euvg myenb, yia Navq haiq nx haib tau meib? yia zuvq lovg puad pwav Jyenq Rwib.
40.10: uaq Euvg, xij zu'g lovg Favb laavg zxv Rweig, yaag lovg Favb laavg Eei haavb taaub txvj lwi zu'q.
40.22: weig zu'g Dyavb Fimq Tevj ninb pivj laavb, Do'g Len Eei swib lyemb Dyavj weib kxmj ninb.
40.12: mavg taub taub Zevb Lo Eei myenb yaag pcv ninb Bua Dxtq Fiag, zx'q x'q myenb Zaaiq Fiag ninb Bua yem Eei txvj.
40.15: “mavg Be-he-motq maa'b! yia zeij ninb Navq yia zeij meib. ninb Eang miaq Navq vovb nx.
40.13: zx'q ninb Bua yetg zuvq pyopq Jyenq niab Buv, yaag Dob ninb Bua yem yemb ken.

14.18: “mq paag Bov Baav huq mig a'q. la'pyeib zxv yaag swiq Gxi leib ninb Eei txvj.

14.21: ninb Eei txn Bua tu'q myenb Taaib, ninb yaag maiq hiuq. ninb Bua Dxtq Fiag aiq, ninb yaag maiq pwatg.

14.6: Toq Win kanb puv, maiq tuvq mavg ninb weig pun ninb tu'q henb, pun ninb a'Neiq Navq maaig kov myenb Jiaj yetg nxm Nxi.
14.2: ninb Zwrtq taaib Navq pyavb nx, yaag ziag mig a'q. ninb Navq tovb linb nx Jiaj, maiq yem a'q.
14.20: meib yetg liud hivb Jiaj myenb, ninb zyrug kwei seij mig a'q. meib Tiuq ninb Eei Myen yaag pun ninb mivb mig a'q.
14.7: “sij kxvq Dyavj zu'g kxij, Zxg maaib lamb Namq haib Zwrtq Zunj. Zunj yaag Daauq Jyenq mivb, maiq tivb a'q.
14.19: uam Zovj la'pyeiq, la'pyeiq zyrug Jia Revg, tomb Byuvg yaag kwaatq Daub peib Eei nia mivb. meib fib Navq Eei myetg paamb myenb maaib lamb Namq Eei txvj.
14.17: yia zruj txvg Eei sig meib tapq Jyenq Bua'g cvj Bx'q Jyenq yenj. meib yaag pwav Jyenq yia Eei zwid.
14.11: Navq Kxiq Eei uam Gaai, Daaib Eei uam haapq yaag Gaai,
14.5: ninb zyavb Eei Nxib Eia'g Jaab Daavg tivg zyavj a'q, ninb Eei Laab sruj se yem meib tivg. meib tivg zyavj ninb zyavb Eei sruj mrug, ninb yaag maiq haib Jiaj Daavg.
14.9: yetq tu'q uam Eei Qiaj ninb zyrug Zwrtq Zunj, yaag Zwrtq Gwaab Navq Dyavb lunj nx.
14.16: Tauj uaq zang meib xij saauq yia Eei zaub Biag, mq paag meib maiq zuaq Jyenq zx'q yia zruj txvg Eei zwid.
14.4: haiq taub haib txb Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq yem maiq Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq Zwrtq? maiq maaib yetg taub.
14.10: mq paag myenb taig, pweij Jyenq za'g Eei. ninb tavj Qiaj ninb zyrug yem haaij?
14.22: ninb Kuvj haid ninb kanb Eei sin zavg mun, yaag weig ninb kanb Raub Eyemq.”
14.12: myenb taig mivb maiq cvj navb taaib, Tauj luvb Jiaj Revg ninb maiq Eia, Gamq ninb, ninb yaag maiq haib Eia.
14.15: meib xij heug, yia zyrug tau meib. meib xij a'Neiq tu'q pwatg meib Eei puad zruj taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
14.13: “feij tu'q meib zx'q yia pivj Jyenq yemb ken. feij tu'q meib Txvq Jyenq yia, zuaq meib Eei ka'Qiaj fiu. feij tu'q meib tivg zyavj zyavb hog weig Javj yia.
14.1: “myenb yem msia'q txn Zwrtq seij Eei Nxib Eia'g zo'g Eei, Kuvj maaib Kwrnj naanb pwavq Revg.

23.3: feij tu'q yia haib hiuq mivb haiq Dau lxd ninb, feij tu'q yia haib mivb Tauj ninb yem Eei txvj.
23.8: “yia mivb tov puv lxd Tinb huvb mq paag ninb maiq yem naaig. mivb fai puv, mq paag maiq pwatg ninb.
23.9: ninb yem pa'q puv zruj kov Eei zyavb hog yia mavg maiq pwatg ninb. yia Win mivb naamb puv mq paag maiq tu'q pwatg ninb.
23.7: yem ninb uaq, Hruq zivj Eei myenb haib Zauj ninb Rcv leid, syemq zwid Jyen zyrug tivg yia yetg liud maiq txvg.
23.5: yia xij hiuq tu'q ninb Navq haiq nx tau yia, yaag xij mevb pc'g ninb Zauj yia kxvq Eei waag.
23.16: Tinb huvb pun yia Hruq mau. nrnb Jiaj uaq taub pun yia kamb Riaj haig a'q,
23.17: weig zu'g Mwavj weib kxmj yia, mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei pwav Jyenq yia Eei Myen.
23.14: ninb weig yia tivg Eei za'eij xij zruj zyavj, ninb Zxg maaib naaiq Euvg za'eij Zamq Eei.
23.4: yia zyrug yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen suj yia Eei sig. yia xij kxvq Revg yia Eei tiub tiub Jauq.
23.2: “ib Nxi yia Zxg vcvg Jyenq vopq Tinb huvb, maiq kunq yia Funb Jyenq yem, ninb Eei puad zatq Jyenq yia.
23.6: Tinb huvb xij lovg ninb Eei tomb Qa'q Zauj yia Rcv fai? maiq zeid! ninb zuvq xij mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag.
23.13: “Tinb huvb yetg liud maiq kxiq yeng. maaib haiq taub haib Tiuq ninb Eei za'eij? ninb xij zruj Eei ninb zyrug zruj.
23.12: yia maiq simq ninb Eei Rwib hatg Eei waag. yia funj yem ninb Eei Rwib Zwrtq Eei waag kaub Jaaij Jiaj yia Qyemj lovg Eei Eang hopq.
23.15: weig naaiq yia yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen kamb Riaj sinb zinj. yia Namq Tauj ninb yia zyrug kamb Riaj haig.
23.11: yia Eei zauj yavb nitq Jyenq ninb Eei zaub Biag mivb. yia kan Jyenq ninb Eei Jauq, yaag maiq mivb Pyen.
23.10: mq paag ninb hiuq tu'q yia yavb Eei Jauq. ninb seij liud yia, yia zyrug Navq Jyem nx.

6.18: kapq txig Zwrtq Jauq Eei myenb leib ninb Bua Eei Jauq, ninb Bua pia'g teib puvb Waav zyrug zu'g myetg.

6.20: ninb Bua maaib lamb Namq haib tu'q mq paag maiq tu'q a'q. mivb Tauj uaq ninb Bua zyrug Hruq lung Revg.

6.28: “ib zang Toq meib Bua mavg yia, yia maiq txv Jyenq meib Bua kxvb pc'g.

6.29: Toq meib Bua cvj Namq Rung. maiq tuvq zruj maiq pcvb fim. ib zang Toq cvj Namq Rung. xij zu'g pun Ziv yia zruj tu'q zivj Eei.
6.19: yem Te-maa teig kapq txig Zwrtq Jauq Eei myenb lxd uam, Qe-Baa Eei Jiaj Jauq scvb eij myenb maaib lamb Namq.
6.17: yua'q Eei zyavb hog sxv yu'g mig a'q. Eutg Jxm zyrug mitg Revg, maiq yem ninb Eei txvj.
6.30: yia kxvq Eei waag maaib haiq Euvg txvg fai? meib Bua Namq taaib yia maiq haib seij maiq Zwrtq ze'g naang?
6.27: meib Bua zuvq tivg mcvg mavg weig tu'q kub hanb fu'Jweiq, yaag maaig kanb Eei lob kcv txig weig tu'q Eaanb.
6.11: “yia maaib haiq Euvg Qa'q pun yia Zxg haib zuaq Jyenq? yia Eei setq mweid Navq haiq nx, yia Zivj taaib xij zu'g maaib nxig tiaq?
6.5: Yiab lxb maaib miaq Eang, ninb heug Eei fai? vovb maaib Byaub Gaauq Eang, ninb heug Eei fai?
6.9: feij tu'q Tinb huvb Lyenj yia huq mwrng, suv ninb Eei puad Pai yia kwavg.
6.16: Do'q kitq sxv zyrug Mwavj, sxv yaag Dwi kub vwaaig Txvq Jyenq.
6.4: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Eei fxvb Zav yem yia Eei sin, fxvb Zav Eei Diab to'g pyauj kxmj sin, yia zu'g Tinb huvb lovg Euvb Euvg hc'q yia.
6.10: Navq naaig zruj haib xn yia Eei Hruq, maiq kunq yia Eei pcvg syem yia zuvq Fyenb yrub Eei Tiuj, weig zu'g yia maiq vcvg Zivb Revg uaq taub Eei waag.
6.22: yia kxvq Jiaj ‘Toq meib Bua pun zivb Eeig yia’? fai ‘lovg meib Bua Eei zinb zxib Rwid Eaanb Mwavj pun yia’?
6.12: yia Eei Qa'q se la'pyeiq Eei Qa'q fai? yia Eei xq sin penj tovb si'q fai?
6.15: yia Eei kxb yrud Duaq yia Navq uamb seij, cvj Navq Do'g zwrnj haib Gaai Revg.
6.13: yia kanb zuvq maiq maaib Qa'q Tevj yia kanb a'q. yia yaag Jomg za'eij mig a'q.
6.26: maiq lamb Namq Eei myenb kxvq Eei waag se Navq Ryaauj nx, uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij tau uaq teij waag?
6.25: zivj Eei waag maaib hatg maad Lo, meib Bua kxvb hemj mq paag kxvb hemj haiq Euvg?

34.34: “Zovb mevb myenb xij kxvq Buaj yia, mwavj yia uaq teij myenb kwai myenb xij kxvq,
34.2: “meib Bua Zovb mevb Eei myenb aa'b! mwavj yia Eei waag maa'b! meib Bua maaib wrnb zaav Eei myenb, Toq pcv mnxmb mwavj yia,
34.36: feij tu'q pun yopq zu'g seij Tauj Diaq. weig zu'g ninb tau Eei waag Navq x'q myenb nx.

34.28: weig naaiq ninb Bua pun myenb Jomg myenb Eei Qiaj mivb Tauj Tinb huvb uaq. zu'g Kruq heug Eei myenb Eei Qiaj, ninb yaag haid mig a'q.
34.7: maaib haiq laanb myenb Navq yopq tiaq tu'q myenb Wrtq Dovg hopq uam heg.
34.29: sij kxvq ninb sekq Ria'g, haiq taub haib tivg ninb maaib zwid? ninb pwav Jyenq ninb Eei Myen, haiq taub haib mavg tu'q pwatg ninb? maiq kunq ninb zruj pun yetg kua'q fai yetg laanb myenb, zuvq fib Navq Eei,
34.19: ninb maiq mavg tomb Jyen Eei Myen, yaag maiq funj putg zxib myenb kaub lovg Jyenq myenb Jomg myenb, weig zu'g ninb Bua yetg zuvq se Tinb huvb Eei puad zeij taaib Eei.
34.17: haiq taub Rxv pcvb fim Eei Jauq hxpg zu'g kunq Eei fai? meib xij tivg pcvb fim Eei, maaib tomb Qa'q Eei Tinb huvb maaib zwid fai?
34.31: “sij kxvq maaib taub myenb kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb ‘yia zu'g Bx'q Faauj liud, yem naaiq mivb yia maiq zruj txvg.
34.30: weig pun maiq kan Tinb huvb Eei myenb maiq tu'q kunq, yaag maiq tu'q zcv Kruj Lopq pc'g fivj.
34.27: weig zu'g ninb Bua mivb Pyen maiq kan ninb, yaag maiq Taaib yetg teij ninb Eei tob leid.
34.11: ninb ziuj myenb zruj Eei winb pun ninb Bua, pun myenb tu'q Pwij ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq.
34.5: “yopq kxvq, ‘yia maiq zruj txvg, mq paag Tinb huvb maiq pun yia tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid.
34.9: weig zu'g ninb kxvq, ‘myenb a'Neiq kan Tinb huvb haib Tevj ninb tu'q haiq Euvg lovj?’
34.16: “sij kxvq meib mevb pc'g, mwavj yia Eei waag maa'b! Toq mwavj yia kxvq.
34.37: ninb vcvg Tinb huvb cvj Jaa ninb Eei zwid, ninb yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj Baij puad kxvq waag Zamq Eei Wrtq Tinb huvb.”
34.4: Bua xij zu'g kinq haiq Euvg se hxpg Eei, Bua kanb xij zu'g tivg haiq Euvg se lovj Eei.
34.10: “weig naaiq meib Bua myenb kwai myenb aa'b! mwavj yia maa'b! Tinb huvb za'kevb! maiq haib zruj x'q sig. nrnb Jiaj uaq taub zuvq maiq haib zruj txvg.
34.22: maiq maaib Matq Jia'q fai mapq Mwavj Eei txvj pun zruj x'q Eei myenb pivj tu'q Bweid.
34.12: zyen Eei, Tinb huvb zuvq maiq zruj waaig sig. nrnb Jiaj uaq taub maiq aauj pcvb fim Eei Jauq Pyen.
34.15: ta'faanb maaib mcvg Eei ka'naaiq zyrug lyemb zeib taig, paamb myenb zu'g Rwrnj penj niab Buv.
34.13: haiq taub xn Tinb huvb kunq Daub peib? fai haiq taub Paaiq ninb kunq kxmj luvb Diaq?
34.26: laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig ninb txv Jyenq zwavj myenb Bx'q ninb Bua,
34.25: Navq naaig, ninb hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj Eei sig zyrug luvb mwrnd zang Twij ninb Bua Eei weig myetg Revg mig a'q.

2.3: zyruq naaig saa-taan, “meib samj mavg yia Eei pru, yopq, Eei fai? yem luvb Diaq maiq maaib yetg laanb myenb Navq ninb zruj Hruq zivj, maiq lamb Gemb txvj. ninb Taaib Tinb huvb yaag simq Gxi, maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig. meib kxvq kau Tauj yia Gxi Rwib pun meib zruj pun ninb, meib zuvq xij myetg ninb yaag maiq maaib kxnb pcvj, mq paag ninb Zxg zyepg zua'q Eei.”
2.8: ninb zyrug zweid Jyenq saaib Dwi zx'q Levj niab mx huq kwaaib kanb Eei sin.
2.9: ninb Eei auq kxvq, “meib Zxg zyepg zua'q Eei zruj? kunq zyruj Tinb huvb yaag taig a'q maa'b!”
2.7: saa-taan zyrug yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Zwrtq mivb hxig yopq pun yopq zyavb to'g haig Eei zweib yem zaub Do'g Eeid faauj Tauj mGxvb pcvb.
2.5: mq paag ib zang suv meib Eei puad hxig ninb Eei sin, ninb zuvq xij yem meib Eei Ra'Myen zyruj meib.”
2.4: saa-taan tau, “Dopq tiq Dopq. myenb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ninb xij lovg weig Fruj ninb kanb Eei mcvg.
2.2: zyruq naaig saa-taan, “meib yem haaij taaib?” saa-taan tau zyruq, “yia yrub luvb Diaq mivb mivb taaib taaib faaub faauj Fiab Fiag.”
2.6: zyruq kxvq Buaj saa-taan, “uaq Euvg, ninb yem meib Eei puab Diaq, mq paag xij zu'g lyrub ninb Eei mcvg.”
2.13: ninb Bua Zauj yopq zweid Jyenq Dau siag Nxi siag mwrnd yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Zauj ninb kxvq yetg Jruj waag, weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg yopq zu'g Eei ze'g naang za'kevb Niaq haig.
2.12: ninb Bua yem ko Eei pwatg ninb, mq paag zia'q maiq tu'q ninb, zyrug puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq, yaag petq ninb Bua Eei lwib Daauq, cvj Eau niab Buv faatq faauj luvb Dxtq Fiag ninb Bua Eei mGxvq.
2.11: yopq Eei pua taub lob kcv txig, se Te-maan zivb Eei myenb, e-li-fatq, Zauj Qu-waa myenb, Bin-Datg, Zauj naa-aa-me myenb, soj-faa, haid kxvq yopq zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq ze'g naang, kx'g myenb zyrug yem kx'g myenb Eei txvj taaib kapq Jyenq txig. ninb Bua tunj zyavj txig yetg Jauq taaib, weig Tevj yopq Jaiq Raub, xn ninb Eei Hruq.
2.1: cvj maaib nxm Nxi finb myenb taaib yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, saa-taan yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua taaib yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen.
2.10: mq paag yopq tau ninb, “meib kxvq waag Navq taub Vovj Eei msia'q txn kxvq nx. Bua yem Tinb huvb Eei puad zipq lovj Eei ka'naaiq. Bua maiq hxpg zu'g zipq maiq penj Eei fai?” yopq zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, yem yopq kxvq Eei waag ninb maiq paamd zwid.

36.18: faij fim og. maiq tuvq pun zinb zxib yua'g meib mivb txvg Jauq, yaag maiq tuvq pun Eaanb Mwavj Zamq Duaq meib mivb Pyen.
36.8: sij kxvq ninb Bua zu'g limg Dob Jyenq yaag zu'g syrug Kruq Eei Laav Reng Jyenq,
36.33: Ba'ov Bwi Eei Qiaj piuj mevb ninb zruj Eei sig, scvb Kuq yaag hiuq tu'q tomb Byuvb Ryaauj xij Tauj.
36.3: yia xij zx'q yia hiuq Eei Jauq yem ko Eei txvj taaib, yia xij kxvq mevb zeij yia taaib uaq taub se pcvb fim Eei.
36.32: ninb lovg Ba'livg pwav Jyenq ninb Eei puad, yaag hatg Ba'ov Pi'q ninb tivg taaib Eei txvj.
36.21: faij fim, maiq tuvq Win mivb lxd zwid Eei Jauq, weig zu'g meib kinq zwid kaub Zamq kinq lovg Kruq naang.
36.14: lunj Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua taig mig a'q. ninb Bua Eei setq mweid Eei mcvg zu'g Eaiq.
36.23: haiq taub Paaiq Tinb huvb zruj Eei Jauq? haiq taub haib kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘meib zruj maiq hxpg’?
36.6: ninb maiq pun x'q myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq, mq paag ninb pun zu'g Kruq Eei myenb tu'q pcvb fim.
36.2: “Toq cvj tiaq Jyenq mwavj yia kxvq ti'q tyen, yia zyrug pun meib hiuq, weig zu'g yia Zxg maaib waag Tevj Tinb huvb kxvq.
36.20: maiq tuvq Namq xij pwatg luvb mwrnd zang Tauj, se maang fivj myenb yem ninb Bua Eei txvj zu'g Pai kwavg Eei zyavb hog.
36.24: meib xij zu'g Javj Jyenq Zev ninb zruj Eei sig se Lo haig, tovb myenb paauj Ruv Zev Eei sig.
36.28: luvb zyrug twib Fiag, Zamb Zamq Eei pun maang myenb.
36.7: ninb zanb zang mavg Jyenq Kuq myenb, lyepg ninb Bua zweid weig Navq huvb tiaj, pun ninb Bua yetg liud tu'q myenb Taaib.
36.29: maaib haiq taub mevb pc'g Bwrnj Navq haiq nx mivb mivb taaib taaib, fai yem Tinb huvb yem Eei txvj Ba'ov Navq haiq nx Bwi?
36.19: meib heug Jyenq Toq Eei haib Tevj meib pyauj Dutq Kruq naang fai? meib kanb Eei yetg zuvq Qa'q haib Tevj tu'q meib Eei fai?
36.17: mq paag meib zuvq zu'g tivg zwid Navq x'q myenb, meib yaag pyauj maiq Dutq pcvb fim Eei zu'g syemq tivg zwid Eei Jauq.
36.31: weig zu'g ninb lovg naaiq teij syemq maang fivj, yaag Zeij puvb zua'g Eei laavb zi'g pun ninb Bua.
36.30: ninb pun Ba'livg faatq Raanj ziuj kxmj ninb kanb, yaag Txvq Jyenq Kxib Do'q.
36.27: ninb pcv uamb Dyepq faauj, pun mrug kapq zunq penj Byuvg,
36.11: sij kxvq ninb Bua mwavj Tinb huvb yaag fub suj ninb, ninb Bua tu'q puvb zua'g Eei zyavb Jyenq yem pwavq ninb Bua Eei Nxib Eia'g, tu'q xnb lx'g Eei yem pwavq ninb Bua Eei Havb taaub.
36.5: “Tinb huvb se henq haig yaag maiq mavg Piaj haiq taub, maiq maaib haiq Euvg ninb maiq hiuq.
36.9: Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj Eei sig, Zauj ninb Bua Eei zwid, se pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj mauj.
36.16: “Tinb huvb yend meib Zwrtq Kwrnj naanb Eei Jauq, pun meib yem Javq Eei txvj, maiq maaib haiq Euvg laanb, pun Beng Jyenq pwavq meib Eei tiab uaq teij Eang hopq maaib Kuq Eei mweij tog.
36.4: za'kevb zyen Eei, yia Eei waag maiq Jaaq, maaib wrnb zaav tunb yunb uaq taub Zauj meib yem.
36.10: ninb pun ninb Bua Eei mnxmb mwavj tu'q haid ninb Faauj Eei waag, yaag hatg ninb Bua kwavg Gxi x'q Eei Jauq.
36.22: “Javj Jyenq Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q Dovg haaij Lo! maiq maaib haiq taub zruj finb scv Navq ninb.
36.12: mq paag sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq mwavj, ninb Bua zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, ninb Bua taig yaag maiq hiuq haiq Euvg.
36.15: Tinb huvb lovg syrug Kruq Eei Jauq Fruj syrug Kruq Eei myenb. ninb lovg zu'g zeij Eei sig Kxi Gxi ninb Bua Eei mnxmb.
36.13: “maiq maaib Hruq Taaib Tinb huvb Eei myenb zanb zang Qiaj Jiad. ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid, ninb Bua maiq heug Jyenq Toq Tevj.
36.26: “Tinb huvb za'kevb Lo, Bua hiuq maiq Revg. Bua maiq haib funj maiq Tauj ninb Eei Havb sruj.
36.25: maang myenb tu'q pwatg ninb zruj Eei sig, paamb myenb yem ko Eei txvj mavg.

20.18: ninb Zwrtq Qa'q tu'q taaib Eei ka'naaiq xij zu'g Twij Rwrnj, yaag maiq tu'q a'Neiq ninb maaid maaig zxng taaib Eei ka'naaiq.
20.8: ninb Navq nxm Beij Jiaj mig a'q, lxd maiq pwatg a'q, yaag Navq luvb mwrnd zang hing yaavb Eei sig ninb mitg mig a'q.
20.3: yia haid meib kxvb hemj Eei waag kxvq to'g yia, mq paag yia kanb Eei Hruq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx tau.
20.21: ninb Eang liud, maiq zevg haiq Euvg a'q. weig naaiq ninb Eei fu'g lo'g maiq tu'q yetg liud yem.
20.14: ninb Eang Eei ka'naaiq yem ka'sia Tiuq mig a'q, yem Hruq ka'Euad penj naavb Jia'q Eei Diab to'g.
20.23: “x'q myenb Eang peuq, pwavq ka'sia Eei zyavb hog, Tinb huvb Eei ka'Qiaj zyrug pctq Zwrtq pun ninb, yaag Navq Byuvg nx Fiag ninb Eei sin.
20.6: maiq kunq ninb tu'q zruj Lo, Bcvg kub vwaaig luvb, ninb Eei mGxvq Tauj Bwrnj,
20.2: “yopq aa'b! meib Eei waag pun yia Hruq maiq lovj, Eyend maiq Jyenq, xij zu'g tau a'q.
20.20: “weig zu'g ninb mauq Eei Jauq maiq haib tivb, ninb a'Neiq Eei ka'naaiq yetg Euvg yaag maiq lyrub a'q.
20.24: ninb xij pyauj Lia'g Jaab sig, tovb si'q fxv zyrug pwrnq Tov ninb.
20.28: ninb Eei Jaab tivb zuvq zu'g txb mivb Revg a'q, yem Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad Eei Nxi zu'g kwaatq mivb a'q.
20.7: ninb xij yetg liud zu'g myetg, Navq ninb kanb Eei Gaiq. pwatg Jiaj ninb Eei myenb xij kxvq, ‘ninb Jiaj haaij mig a'q?’
20.29: naaiq se x'q myenb yem Tinb huvb tu'q Eei pwrng, se Tinb huvb Paaiq pun ninb Ripg.”
20.19: weig zu'g ninb zeij myenb Jomg myenb cvj kwavg ninb Bua, yaag Zaavq maiq zeid ninb kanb Zeij taaib Eei pyauq.
20.17: ninb maiq tu'q mavg Do'q, se maaib mweib txvb Zauj vovb Exj lyrug Zwrtq Eei Do'q.
20.27: luvb xij pun Ziv ninb zruj Eei zwid, Dau xij zruj zxvb zevj tivg ninb.
20.11: ninb Eei Buvq maaib myenb lunj myenb Eei Qa'q, mq paag xij zu'g Zauj ninb Fiag penj niab Buv.
20.5: x'q myenb tu'q hivb Eei zyavb hog se navq Eei, maiq kan Tinb huvb Eei myenb Eei Fyenb yrub yaag weig tavb paaq Navq.
20.9: pwatg Jiaj ninb Eei myenb yetg liud maiq tu'q cvj pwatg, ninb yem Eei txvj yaag maiq tu'q cvj pwatg ninb.
20.16: ninb xij sx'q naavb Jia'q Eei Diab to'g, naavb to'g xij Ex'q ninb taig.
20.4: “meib maiq hiuq fai? yem lod! Nxi taaib, tovb paamb myenb Zo'q ho'g tu'q yem paamb ken uaq zang,
20.10: ninb Eei txnb Jweiq xij zu'g Jaauq suv myenb Jomg myenb. kanb Eei puad xij zu'g Twij Rwrnj ninb Eei zinb zxib.
20.22: ninb kaub penj Jiaj Eei zyavb hog, ninb zu'g Dxtq Fiag Kruq, yetg zuvq syem Eei ze'g naang zyrug taaib hxig ninb.
20.12: “maiq kunq x'q sig yem ninb Eei Rwib se kaam Eei, yaag maiq kunq ninb fapq Jyenq ninb Eei Byetg ka'Diaq,
20.15: x'q myenb na'q zinb zxib cvj loq Zwrtq, Tinb huvb zruj pun uaq teij ka'naaiq yem ninb Eei ka'sia pctq Zwrtq taaib.
20.13: maiq kunq ninb maiq Kavq liaq Zwrtq, Zxg Fxm Jyenq Rwib ka'Euad,
20.26: ninb syru Eei zinb zxib xij zu'g myetg Revg. maiq zeid myenb pyomq Eei trud xij zx'q ninb puaq Qwi. yem ninb Eei Dopg liub zevg Fiag Eei ka'naaiq yaag zu'g puaq myetg Revg.
20.25: ninb pcv fxv Zwrtq, fxv zyrug yem ninb Eei sin Zwrtq taaib. fxvb Zav tweib mweid kua'q Jyenq taamq Eei uam cvq Zwrtq Fav, hc'q ninb kamb Riaj! haig.

24.18: “x'q myenb Navq uamb Byaaud syepg syepq Byrub Jyenq kan uamb ming mivb. ninb Bua yem teib puv tu'q Eei pwrng zu'g zyruj. ninb Bua maiq tu'q mivb ninb Bua Eei a'vung Wivj.
24.8: ninb Bua yem Bov zu'g Byuvg lyemb Dxn, zyrug Qam la'pyeiq weig zu'g maiq maaib txvj pivj.
24.3: ninb Bua zx'q kub hanb fu'Jweiq Eei lxb, yaag zx'q aub kwaaq Eei vovb zruj txvb taaub.
24.21: ninb Bua Pyenj maiq yuvd Jiaj kub vwaad Eei msia'q txn, yaag maiq zruj lovj pun aub kwaaq.
24.14: luvb maiq kcvb Fav, taij myenb Eei myenb Jiad sin, weig mivb taij myenb Jomg myenb Zauj tavb tonj Eei myenb. luvb mwrnd zang ninb zruj za'g nimg ka'naaiq.
24.23: Tinb huvb Zeij pcvb xn pun ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua maaib txvj Kauj, mq paag ninb Eei mziv zanb zang mavg Jyenq ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq.
24.6: ninb Bua mivb myenb Eei Deig Raud Byaub txvg, yaag mivb x'q myenb Eei a'vung Wivj Raud kc'q liud zevg Fiag Eei pyruq.
24.2: myenb swiq Deib Genj Eei tovg, ninb Bua Zaavq pa'ki yuvb Zauj yuvb txb mivb yuvd.
24.20: ninb Bua Eei maa zuvq la'Ku'q ninb Bua, kcvb mau Eang Revg ninb Bua Eei sei haid kaam Eei. maiq maaib haiq taub Javj tu'q ninb Eei Buaj. x'q myenb Navq Dyavj nx, nauq Dutq.
24.24: ninb Bua tu'q myenb Taaib se weig Zaamj paaq Navq, zyav naaig maiq pwatg mig a'q. ninb Bua Navq miaq nx, Eauj Gaai, yaag Navq zu'g kaatq Eei Byaub txq nx.
24.7: ninb Bua lcvb kcvq Eei pweij Jiaj mwrnd, maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q. Jwavq Eei zyavb hog maiq maaib haiq Euvg homg.
24.19: luvb haand, Eutg to'g pun sxv yu'g mivb Revg. yemb ken fib Navq Eei pun paamd zwid uaq teij zutg Revg mig a'q.
24.17: mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei zyavb hog weig ninb Bua yetg zuvq se Navq luvb Dxm Eei Fav, weig zu'g ninb Bua kwenj luvb mwrnd zang kamb Riaj Eei sig.
24.11: ninb Bua yem x'q myenb Eei yetg lyrud yetg lyrud ka'lanq Dyavj Bu'Dovj zaaj ka'lanq yrub, yaag yem Eweib a'vung pyruq Eei zxvb Eweib pyruq, mq paag ninb Bua Jaav Gaatq Jyenq yem.
24.5: Navq yem teib puvb Waav Eei Yiab lxb, myenb Jomg myenb Zwrtq mivb Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq lxd Eang. ninb Bua Kauj teib puvb Waav wij ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq.
24.9: x'q myenb Zaavq maiq maaib tia Eei kub hanb fu'Jweiq yem maa Eei la'Kwrtq mivb, zx'q myenb Jomg myenb Eei kub vwaad zruj txvb taaub.
24.16: luvb mwrnd zang Janb za'g Bx'q Tov Kwrtq pia'g pyauq, luvb Nxi zang ninb Bua pivj, ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Fav.
24.4: ninb Bua fovq kub hanb fu'Jweiq Zwrtq Jaub Len, luvb Diaq Eei mrud laanb myenb Jomg myenb pivj Revg.
24.10: myenb Jomg myenb Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq lcvb kcvq Eei yem, maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q, ninb Bua Hruq sia Jyenq Tevj myenb Daam Byaub zeiq.
24.22: mq paag Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei Qa'q myetg Revg henq haig Eei myenb. Tinb huvb yetq tovd sin ninb Bua zyrug taig Revg.
24.12: yem zivb ka'Euad maaib aaq lamb taig Eei myenb Funb Eei Qiaj Zwrtq, zu'g mun Eei myenb heug Jyenq Toq Tevj, mq paag Tinb huvb maiq mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Toq Eei waag.
24.15: Yenj auq Eei myenb zuaq Jyenq Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog Tauj. ninb kxvq, ‘maiq maaib haiq taub Eei mziv tu'q pwatg yia.’ ninb yaag pwav Jyenq ninb Eei Myen.
24.13: “cvj maaib myenb Gemb Fav, ninb Bua maiq zua'g Fav Eei Jauq, yaag maiq kan Fav Eei Jauq yavb.
24.1: “nrnb Jiaj uaq taub weig haiq tiug maiq tivg syemq zwid Eei Nxi? hiuq tu'q ninb uaq teij weig haiq tiug maiq tu'q pwatg ninb tivg taaib Eei Nxi?
24.25: “sij kxvq maiq zeid Navq naaig, haiq taub haib pun Ziv yia kxvb pc'g? haiq taub haib pun Ziv yia kxvq Eei waag se maiq zyen?”

28.18: lyemb maiq zu'g kxvq Tauj yem Kxiq Jaaij Eei la'pyeiq fai Rav Jiaj Eei kivj, Zovb mevb Eei Jaab zinb se kaub Jaaij Jiaj Jaaij Eei la'pyeib zru.
28.8: Zyruq Eei Yiab zxib maiq Zaaiq Jiaj, syenb yaag maiq yavb Jiaj uaq.
28.3: myenb pun Mwavj Eei txvj Tiuq penj Fav. ninb Bua zimb lxd yem ko Jiaj Eei txvj, yem mapq Mwavj Eei txvj wetq Zwrtq la'pyeiq.
28.21: Zovb mevb se pivj Jyenq yetg zuvq maaib mcvg Eei ka'naaiq Eei mziv, yaag kem Jyenq yem Daamb luvb Eei nx'g.
28.14: Daub Diaq Eei uam kxvq, ‘Zovb mevb maiq yem yia ka'Euad.’ Kxiq yaag kxvq, ‘Zovb mevb maiq Zauj yia yem.’
28.23: “Tinb huvb mevb pc'g lxd Zovb mevb uaq tiub Jauq, yaag hiuq tu'q Zovb mevb yem Eei txvj.
28.6: Daub Diaq Eei la'pyeiq maaib la'pyeib Jaaij Buaq Eei, la'pyeiq ka'Euad yaag maaib Jyemb Bwrnq.
28.2: Lia'q yem Daub Diaq wetq Zwrtq taaib, tovb yaag yem la'pyeiq sinj taaib.
28.20: uaq Euvg Zovb mevb yem haaij taaib? wrnb zaav Eei txvj yem haaij?
28.24: weig zu'g ninb mavg Tauj Jomg Daub peib, yaag pwatg yem luvb Diaq Eei Euvb Euvg.
28.28: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj myenb, ‘xij zu'g Taaib zyruq, naaiq se Zovb mevb. yaag xij zu'g kwavg x'q sig, naaiq se wrnb zaav.’+”
28.7: “uaq tiub Jauq maiq maaib haiq nxm tomb Jaavq hiuq, tomb Jaavb vovb Eei mziv yaag maiq pwatg Jiaj.
28.19: e-Ti-o-pia yavb uvq Eei la'pyeib Jaaij yaag maiq haib peiq maiq Tauj, zyen Jyem Eei Jaab zinb yaag peiq maiq zaaig a'q.
28.17: Jyem Zauj Jaaij Eei kivj yaag peiq maiq Tauj. yaag maiq haib lovg zyen Jyem Eei Jaab sig maaid Dutq.
28.27: uaq zang ninb pwatg Zovb mevb yaag kxvq se lovj Eei. ninb lyepg Jiad yaag zaab mavg.
28.11: ninb zc'q Jyenq uamb Ewrnb, maiq pun uam saamj Zwrtq, pun pivj Jyenq Eei ka'naaiq Zwrtq taaib yem Fav.
28.5: Daub peib c'q, Zwrtq laavb zi'g, mq paag Daub Diaq lung Revg Navq zu'g trud puaq nx.
28.9: “myenb suv puad Bx'q vcvg haig Eei la'pyeiq, wetq Bov Fiag Tauj kxn.
28.16: o-fi Eei Jyem Zauj Jaaij haig Eei la'pyeib Jia'q pc'g fai Buaq Eei la'pyeib Jaaij yaag maaid maiq Dutq,
28.4: ninb Bua yem leib myenb Eei txvj ko Eei, wetq Daub Diaq Eei Kwrtq, Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb zuvq maiq Javj ninb Bua. ninb Bua leib tu'q myenb ko, yem Kwrtq ka'Euad nanq Jyenq Laav Dyruj mivb Dyruj taaib.
28.10: ninb yem la'pyeib Bcvj ka'Euad wetq Jauq, ninb Eei mziv tu'q pwatg Euvb Euvg Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq.
28.22: zu'g myetg Eei txvj Zauj yemb ken kxvq, ‘yia Bua Eei mnxmb haid teij waab Ryaauj kxvq Tauj Zovb mevb.’
28.12: “mq paag Zovb mevb c'q, xij zu'g mivb haiq Dau lxd? wrnb zaav Eei txvj yem haaij?
28.15: “lovg Jyem maaid yaag maiq tu'q, yaag maiq haib Ryav Eaanb zig ninb Eei Jaab zinb.
28.13: myenb maiq hiuq tu'q Zovb mevb Eei Jaab zinb, yem yaavb ken lxd maiq pwatg.
28.1: “zyen a'q, maaib wetq Eaanb Eei Zyavq, yaag maaib txvj sinj Jyem.
28.26: ninb Paaiq zyavj Byuvg Eei sruj mrug, yaag tivg Ba'livg trud Eei Jauq,
28.25: Tinb huvb pun Ryaauj maaib Niab taaub uaq zang, yaag lovg ka'naaiq Laau uam,

7.18: meib Dxmb Dxm mivb zaab mavg ninb, mrud pwrn zyavb hog yaag Kauq ninb.
7.3: fib Navq Eei, yia Laaj Jiaj Laaj zyavb Jyenq maiq lamb lovg, yaag mwrnd Jiaj mwrnd zu'g tiaq Kruq.
7.8: ib zang mavg Jyenq yia uaq taub Eei mziv maiq tu'q cvj pwatg yia. meib xij lxd yia, mq paag yia maiq yem a'q.
7.19: cvj Dovg haaij laub meib Zivj Win kanb puv maiq mavg yia, fai puvj yia kanb yem Tauj haib tu'q na'q aaj yia Eei uamb Rwib?
7.9: “Navq Bwrnj Raanj mitg Revg, myenb Fiag yemb ken maiq haib cvj faauj taaib.
7.7: o Tinb huvb aag, Toq Javj Jyenq og, yia Eei mcvg se Navq Tauq yetg Rung Qiaj. yia Eei mziv maiq tu'q cvj pwatg lovj Eei Jauq.
7.5: yia Eei sin putq kcv pwavq Revg, niab Buv yaag txvj lwi zu'q. yia Eei Dopq putq faav, cvj Rc'q, putq novg.
7.16: yia yruj yia Eei mcvg, maiq xij yetg liud zyavb. puvj yia, sweib yia kanb yem, weig zu'g yia Eei Nxib Eia'g Kuvj Navq Tauq yetg Rung Qiaj.
7.20: mavg myenb Eei Tinb huvb aa'b? sij kxvq yia paamd zwid yia Navq haiq nx hxig zu'g meib? meib weig haiq tiug zx'q yia txvj meib Eei fxvb Zav Eei Bc'g? yia weig haiq tiug penj meib xij zu'g Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq?
7.17: “paamb myenb penj haiq Euvg meib Zivj funj lovg Jyenq yaag Yetq Hruq ninb?
7.14: mq paag meib pun yia Beij pwatg hc'q yia, lovg hing yaavb Eei sig pun yia kamb Riaj haig.
7.4: yia pweij Fiag Eei zyavb hog, yia kxvq, ‘yia Tauj haiq zang Zivj tu'q Jiad sin?’ mq paag luvb mwrnd zang Daauq haig. yia Kuvj Byenq mivb Byenq taaib, nxig maiq tu'q luvb Fav.
7.21: meib weig haiq tiug maiq kwavg yia txvg Eei txvj, yaag zx'q Gxi yia Eei zwid? weig zu'g maiq laub yia xij pweij niab Buv ka'Euad. meib xij lxd yia mq paag yia maiq yem a'q.”
7.2: Navq nrub za'kevb xij lxd txvj pivj laavb, Navq maaig kov Eei myenb zuaq ninb Eei kovb zinb.
7.6: “yia Eei Nxib Eia'g kaub syepq Reng swij Datq Dia Eei pyaaq, Tauj setq mweid yaag maiq lamb Namq txvj a'q.
7.13: yia kxvq, ‘yia Eei Zruj haib Tevj yia Kub yem. yia pweij Eei txvj haib Jaiq teij yia Eei Kruq naang.’
7.12: yia zruj Kxiq fai Kxiq Eei tomb Byaud meib Zivj xij zu'g pun myenb zuaq Jyenq yia?
7.15: weig naaiq yia xij kinq kob Jaav taig kaub lovj yem Jyenq yia naaiq nxm sin.
7.11: “weig naaiq yia zyrug maiq Gapg yia Eei Rwib, yia Eei Hruq mun Jyenq xij kxvq a'q. yia Hruq Kruq haig zyrug xij zu'g kxvq.
7.1: “paamb myenb yem luvb Diaq Kuvj zu'g zruj Kruq, ninb Eei Nxib Eia'g Navq zu'g maaig kov Eei myenb,
7.10: ninb maiq cvj Rwrnj kanb Eei pyauq. ninb yem Eei txvj Eei myenb yaag la'Ku'q ninb mig a'q.

29.18: “uaq zang yia Namq, ‘yia tu'q yem yia kanb Eei pyauq taig, cvj Jaa yia Eei Nxib Eia'g Dovg saab zyru Zamq.

29.3: uaq zang ninb Eei tav ziuj Jyenq yia Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig, ninb Eei Fav ziuj yia yavb Mwavj Eei txvj.
29.21: “myenb mwavj yia yaag zuaq Jyenq, sekq Ria'g Eei mwavj yia Zaavb laavb Eei waag.
29.14: yia lovg zruj hxpg Eei Jauq txvj lwi zu'q, yia zruj pcvb fim Eei sig txvj tomb lwib Daauq Zauj mGxvb peu.
29.23: ninb Bua zuaq yia Navq zuaq Byuvg, yaag mxvj Gxi Rwib Navq zuaq Zunb ken Byuvg.
29.6: yia yavb Eei Jauq zuvq maaib vovb Exj Raauj zauj, la'pyeiq yaag weig yia lyrug Zwrtq ka'lanq yrub Navq Do'q nx.
29.2: “o feij tu'q yia Eei mcvg haib Rwrnj taaib Navq zinb Daavg Eei Laab Eia'g, Navq Tinb huvb kruj Jyenq yia uaq teij Nxi.
29.20: myenb zanb zang Taaib yia, yia Eei Qa'q yaag zanb zang henq, maiq Twij.’
29.24: ninb Bua Hruq mau Eei zyavb hog, yia zruj Myen Fav Eei Jyetq. ninb Bua pwatg yia Eei Myen Fav, Jyetq, zyrug Tevj ninb Bua maiq Raub.
29.7: “yia Zwrtq Tauj zivb kcvb Eei zyavb hog, yem tomb zwavj zaamg zweid Jyenq yia Eei weig,
29.19: yia Navq tiub Dyavj maaib Ruvb Daauq Jyenq mivb Tauj uam, yaag maaib Byuvb swiq zyavb mwrnd yem yia Eei Gwaab.
29.17: yia Bx'q nauq myenb waaig myenb Eei Eaab vau, yaag aapq ninb puvj kwavg Eaab vaatg Jyenq Eei ka'naaiq.
29.11: “ta'faanb mnxmb haid Eei myenb, ninb Bua kxvq yia maaib xnb lx'g, mziv pwatg uaq teij yaag Taaib yia,
29.5: nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Zxg Zauj yia yem, yia Eei naamb Erud yaag weib kxmj yia.
29.9: pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq maiq Ko lo, lovg puad pwav Jyenq kanb Eei Rwib.
29.16: yia txvj myenb Jomg myenb Eei tia, yaag Tevj tovb yia maiq hiuq Eei myenb Beng ninb Bua Eei sig.
29.4: uaq zang yia lunj, henq Eei zyavb hog, Tinb huvb zruj yia Eei txig yaag peu Jyenq yia Eei Dopg liub.
29.10: maaib mevb taub Eei myenb yaag sekq Ria'g Eei, ninb Bua Gapg Jyenq Rwib, maiq Ko lo.
29.22: yia kxvq liud ninb Bua maiq Ko lo, yia Eei waag Navq Byuvb swiq nx, Dyepq ninb Bua.
29.12: weig zu'g yia Tevj heug Jyenq Toq Eei myenb Jomg myenb Zauj maiq maaib myenb Tevj Eei kub hanb fu'Jweiq.
29.15: yia zruj mziv mcvb myenb Eei mziv, yaag zruj zauj Bai myenb Eei zauj.
29.13: aaq lamb zu'g myetg Eei myenb pwav waag pun yia, yia yaag pun aub kwaaq Eei Hruq tu'q Fyenb yrub Eei paauj Ruv.
29.1: yopq cvj px'q Jyenq kxvq ninb Eei Jaub lrug. ninb kxvq,
29.25: yia zruj ninb Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq, yaag kinq Jauq pun ninb Bua yavb. yia Navq huvb tiaj yem ninb Eei Junb pcv kwanb Bu'Dovj, yaag Navq taub xn Hruq Eei myenb xn Raub Eyemq Eei myenb Eei Hruq.

19.18: lyemb faij Eei fu'Jweiq mavg Piaj yia. yia Jiad sin ninb Bua kxvq yia.
19.8: Tinb huvb tavq Jyenq yia Eei Jauq yia zyrug Jiaj maiq tu'q. ninb yaag pun yia Eei Jauq Mwavj mivb.
19.3: meib Bua kxvq to'g yia maiq zeiq zyepg Rung a'q. meib Bua txvg yia, meib Bua maiq Eaiq fai?
19.21: “lob kcv aa'b! Kxb lyenb yia maa'b! Toq Kxb lyenb yia, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Eei puad Bx'q yia.
19.14: yia Eei Zyenb Ze'q leib Gxi yia, yia Eei lob kcv txig la'Ku'q yia mig a'q.
19.23: “feij tu'q yia kxvq Eei waag tu'q fiaq Jyenq, feij tu'q faauj Jyenq yem srub taan.
19.6: uaq Euvg meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tu'q se Tinb huvb Navq naaiq zruj pun yia, yaag lovg ninb Eei muvd Reng Jyenq yia.
19.2: “meib Bua xij zruj pun yia Eei Hruq Kruq, yaag lovg waag mxg yia Dovg haaij laub?
19.20: yia Eei Dopq nctq Jyenq Buvq, yia pyauj Zwrtq sivj mcvg Dovg yetg nxm Meib nauq.
19.24: feij tu'q lovg Lia'g Jaab sig zu'g la'pyeiq, cvj lovg Juvd toj zu'g liud Eei txvj, pun yetg liud yem.
19.28: “sij kxvq meib Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib hxig ninb?’ yaag kxvq, ‘Zua'q sig Eei kxnb pcvj yem ninb kanb,’
19.7: “yia heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘zu'g zruj to'g aaq lo'b!’ yaag maiq maaib haiq taub tau. yia heug Jyenq Toq Tevj, mq paag maiq tu'q pcvb fim Eei Jauq.
19.29: meib Bua xij zu'g kamb Riaj Ru'g Daauq, weig zu'g Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad, ninb lovg Ru'g Daauq tivg zwid. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q maaib taub syemq zwid.”
19.19: yia zua'g Jiaj Eei yetg zuvq lob kcv txig yruj yia, tovb yia Namq Eei myenb yaag Byenq Myen pun yia.
19.17: yia Eei auq yruj yia Eei Rwib Eei Qiaj. yia kanb Eei Zyen kxj Zyen yrud kamb Riaq yia.
19.27: yia kanb tu'q pwatg ninb, yia kanb Eei mziv tu'q mavg ninb, yaag maiq zeid kanb taub. yia Eei Hruq mau Kruq haig.
19.11: ninb Qiaj Jiad, nrud haig yia, yaag funj yia penj ninb Eei winb wavq.
19.5: sij kxvq meib Bua Zev meib Bua kanb kaub Lo yia, yaag funj yia pwavb Eei Kruq naang pun Ziv yia zruj txvg,
19.9: ninb zx'q Gxi yia Eei Favb laavg, yaag zx'q Gxi yia Dovj Eei nivq.
19.16: yia heug yia Eei pru mq paag ninb maiq tau, yia xij zu'g lovg Rwib Jrub ninb Bua.
19.4: sij kxvq yia za'kevb zruj txvg, yia zruj txvg Eei Kuvj Dxtq zu'g yia kanb Navq.
19.10: ninb weib Jyenq yia pyei puv Bx'q yia, yia zyrug paaig Revg mig a'q. yia maaib lamb Namq Eei, ninb pcv Zwrtq Navq pcv tiub Dyavj nx.
19.22: meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij hxig yia Navq Tinb huvb hxig? meib Bua Zxg zruj to'g pun yia maiq kcvb kauj?
19.12: ninb Eei Junb pcv kwanb lomb Rxib taaib. ninb Bua liug leid Jauq Bx'q yia, yaag lyepg Zyavq weib kxmj yia.
19.15: yem yia Eei pyauq Eei Kc'q myenb Zauj msia'q pru funj yia zruj ka'Eiag Eei myenb. ziuj ninb Bua Eei mziv mavg, yia zuvq penj kanb fivj myenb.
19.13: Tinb huvb pun yia Eei kxb yrud kwavg yia, tovb yia zua'g Eei myenb maiq lcvd yia a'q.
19.26: zuaq yia Dopq huq Revg, yem yia Eei xq sin yia zuvq tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb.
19.25: weig zu'g yia hiuq tu'q zua'g yia uaq taub zyavb Jyenq, setq mweid ninb xij taaib sruq Jyenq Daub peib.

17.3: “Tinb huvb aag, Toq meib zruj pub Jaa peu yia. Zwrtq liud meib, maaib haiq taub xij weig yia zruj pub Jaa?
17.8: Hruq zivj Eei myenb laaij naaiq teij sig za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig. maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb Jiad taaib kxvq yia maiq kan Tinb huvb.
17.9: Kuq myenb kan lovj ninb yavb Eei Jauq. puad Zivb Revg Eei myenb kunq zruj kunq henq Jyenq faauj.
17.7: laaij Raub Kruq yia Eei mziv maiq Fav a'q. yia Eei puab zauj Navq tovb linb nx.
17.5: myenb maaig kanb Eei kxb yrud weig tu'q zinb Eaanb, ninb Eei fu'Jweiq xij zu'g syrug Kruq.
17.16: yia maaib lamb Namq Eei xij Fiag Tauj yemb ken Eei kcvb fai? yia Bua lomb Rxib xij Fiag niab Buv fai?”
17.14: sij kxvq yia Buaj zruq, ‘meib zruj yia Eei tia,’ yaag Buaj kcvb mau, ‘meib se yia Eei maa,’ fai ‘yia Eei txg,’
17.4: meib pun ninb Bua Eei Hruq maiq haib mevb pc'g. weig naaiq meib zyrug maiq pun ninb Bua hivb Jiaj.
17.2: zyen Eei, maaib Jyetq yia Eei myenb weib kxmj yia, yia Eei mziv yaag mavg Jyenq ninb Bua Zua'q yia.
17.6: “Tinb huvb pun yia yem pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj zruj kruq kxvq. ninb Bua yaag Twiq uamb Rwib nctq yia Eei Myen.
17.13: sij kxvq yia maaib lamb Namq yemb ken penj yia Eei pyauq, sij kxvq yia pweij Fiag Mwavj Eei txvj,
17.12: yia Eei lob kcv txig pun luvb mwrnd zang penj luvb Nxi zang. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘Fav se nitq fatq Mwavj.’
17.15: uaq Euvg yia maaib lamb Namq Eei yem haaij? yia maaib lamb Namq Eei haiq taub tu'q pwatg?
17.11: “yia Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiaj mig a'q. yia taaq Eei za'eij, se yem Hruq Namq Eei, tavj mig a'q.
17.1: “yia Eei Ba'Riu yu'g, yia Eei Nxib Eia'g yaag Jiaj mig a'q. zruq yaag zuaq Jyenq yia.
17.10: “mq paag meib Bua, se meib Bua yetg zuvq, kunq cvj taaib Rung. yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj yia zuvq lxd maiq pwatg yetg taub Zovb mevb myenb.

38.18: meib hiuq tu'q Daub peib Dovg haaij Javq fai? meib hiuq tu'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq nx, kxvq Buaj yia maa'b!
38.8: “Kxiq Eei uam pctq Zwrtq Navq kub vwaad Zwrtq maa Eei ka'sia uaq zang, haiq taub kwrn kcvb tavq Jyenq Kxiq?
38.33: meib hiuq tu'q luvb Eei leib latg fai? meib haib pun naaiq teij leib latg kunq luvb Diaq fai?
38.3: meib xij zu'g liug leid zyavj Navq taub Junb zeiq myenb. yia xij naaig meib, meib yaag xij zu'g tau yia.
38.32: meib haib txb Leib kwanb ziuj ninb Bua Eei kweij, fai txb pa'tauq Leij Zauj kan ninb Eei Leij fai?
38.21: meib za'kevb hiuq Eei, weig zu'g zeij paamb ken uaq zang meib zuvq Zwrtq seij taaib a'q. meib yem Eei Nxib Eia'g kevb Zamq haig.
38.35: meib haib Paaiq Ba'livg Fiag, Ba'livg zyrug Buaj meib, ‘yia Bua yem naaiq’?
38.40: “syenb Baapq Jyenq yem ninb Bua Eei Kwrtq fai yem Bweid Eei txvj zuaq, meib haib lxd ka'naaiq pun Eang, fai pun syenb lunj tu'q Eang peuq?
38.14: Daub peib kxiq yeng Navq Bx'q Jyenq yenj Eei pa'naib nia, maang mwrtg hing Zwrtq mevb Eei Navq lwib hruj nx.
38.23: yia lyrub Jyenq sxv Zauj px'g weig ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog, weig Bx'q Jaaj Zauj Bx'q tomb Jaaj Eei Nxi.
38.6: Dau Eei kxnb Do'q lyepg yem haiq Euvg kub vwaaig? haiq taub an paamb ken Eei kx'q kaub lovg Jyenq Jiaj uaq nxm la'pyeiq?
38.34: “meib haib heug Bwrnj twib Byuvg Fiag yemj Jyenq meib fai?
38.2: “naaiq tovb haiq taub lovg maiq maaib wrnb zaav Eei waag pun yia Eei za'eij mwavb mivb?
38.36: haiq taub pun myenb Eei Hruq maaib Zovb mevb, yaag pun Hruq maaib wrnb zaav?
38.20: meib haib txb ninb mivb Tauj ninb Eei txvj, weig pun meib hiuq tu'q mivb ninb Eei pyauq uaq tiub Jauq fai?
38.24: mivb Tauj Fav pun Gxi Eei txvj yem haaij? fai mivb Tauj tov puv Eei Ryaauj pun Raanj pwavq Daub peib Eei txvj yem haaij?
38.28: Byuvg maaib tia Eei fai? fai haiq taub yuvd Byuvb swiq Dyepq?
38.7: uaq zang luvb Dxm Eei Leij lomb Rxib paauj Ruv, zwavj finb myenb Fyenb yrub Eei heug.
38.29: haiq taub zruj sxv Eei maa? luvb zavg Eei Byuvb swiq kitq, haiq taub yuvd taaib?
38.19: “Fav yem Eei txvj yavb haaij mivb? Mwavj yem Eei txvj yem haaij?
38.17: maaib haiq taub pun meib hiuq tu'q zu'g taig Eei kcvb? yemb ken Mwavj Eei txvj Eei kcvb meib pwatg Jiaj Eei fai?
38.38: pun niab Buv kitq penj Dunb, niab Dunb yaag kitq Jyenq Jaaj?
38.31: “meib haib zx'q siag muab sia'q Leij Dob Jyenq, fai Jaiq Gxi faamb Ziv Leij Eei Laav fai?
38.30: uam vcvg mivb Navq la'pyeiq, Kxiq Eei uamb ming yaag kitq penj sxv.
38.27: haiq taub pun Daub Waav Daub Gaai tu'q uam kauj weig yuvd Dau Zwrtq miab mcv?
38.11: yaag kxvq, ‘meib taaib Tauj naaiq Navq, maiq tuvq Jiaj Daavg, meib henq haig Eei uamb laavg xij zu'g tivb Fiag naaiq.’
38.5: haiq taub tivg Dau lomb haaij Lo? taaij meib hiuq Eei saa'b? haiq taub pcv Laav Dx'g?
38.9: se yia lovg Bwrnj pwav Jyenq Kxiq, yaag lovg Mwavj hod peu Jyenq ninb.
38.16: “meib pia'g Jiaj Tauj Kxiq Eei Ewrnb, fai yavb Jiaj Kxib Do'q Do Jiaj Eei txvj fai?
38.41: nx'g aa laaij maiq maaib ka'naaiq Eang Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq, ninb Eei txn heug Toq Tinb huvb Tevj. haiq taub lxd ka'naaiq pun nx'g aa Eang?
38.37: haiq taub maaib Zovb mevb saauq Bwrnj? fai haiq taub haib toj Zwrtq luvb Eei uamb ovj,
38.4: “yia lyepg paamb ken Eei kxnb Do'q uaq zang, meib yem haaij? sij kxvq meib hiuq, Buaj yia maa'b!
38.10: yia tivg Kxiq Eei kapg Jaaij, an Jyenq kcvb Zauj kcvb sxn,
38.22: “meib pia'g Jiaj sxv Eei lamd, fai pwatg Jiaj px'g Eei lamd fai?
38.12: “yopq aag, yem meib Eei seij zeiq meib tu'q hatg Jiaj luvb Dxm, yaag pun luvb Dxm Ryruq hiuq tu'q ninb Eei txvj,
38.15: x'q myenb Eei Fav zu'g zx'q Gxi, zyrug tavq Jyenq maiq pun ninb Bua zruj to'g Eei sig.
38.13: weig pun ninb haib ziuj Jomg luvb kxn, yaag zung x'q myenb Zwrtq ninb pivj Eei txvj?
38.1: uaq zang zyruq yem Ryaaub zung tau yopq Eei waag. ninb kxvq,
38.26: haiq taub pun Byuvg twib Fiag maiq maaib myenb yem Eei Dau, Zauj maiq maaib myenb yem Eei teib puvb Waav?

31.18: (weig zu'g ninb lunj Eei zyavb hog yia txb ninb Lo taaib Navq penj ninb Eei tia nx, ninb yem maa Eei ka'sia Zwrtq taaib yia kruj ninb),
31.8: kunq pun yia zwavj yaag pun kanb taub Eang, yaag Toq weig yia Zwrtq taaib Eei kcvb zwavj lyemb Ruvb pcv Zwrtq.
31.33: sij kxvq yia pivj yia paamd Eei zwid Navq aa-Dam, zx'q zwid pivj Jyenq yia Eei Hruq,
31.3: ninb maiq zeid xij pun zruj maiq hxpg Eei myenb zu'g ze'g naang, yaag pun paamd zwid Eei myenb zu'g sig fai?
31.32: (yem ko taaib Eei myenb maiq zu'g yem heib hxvg Jiaj mwrnd, yia Eei kcvb Kxi Gxi zipq Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb),
31.21: sij kxvq yia hiuq tu'q yem zivb kcvb Daavg Eei sig txvb maaib myenb Tevj yia, yia zyrug suv puad zeij kub hanb fu'Jweiq,
31.35: “o feij tu'q maaib taub mwavj yia. (naaiq yia faauj yia Eei Buaj. Toq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub tau yia.) Toq koj yia uaq taub zx'q koj Eei waag fiaq Jyenq.
31.40: Toq pun Fimq Zwrtq tiq Byaub witq, pun miab zweij Zwrtq tiq Byaub Baa-li.” yopq kxvq Eei waag Revg mig a'q.
31.14: uaq Euvg Tinb huvb Jiad taaib naaig yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj? ninb zaab naaig yia Eei zyavb hog yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx tau?
31.23: weig zu'g Tinb huvb pun taaib Eei ze'g naang pun yia kamb Riaj haig. yaag weig ninb Eei haavb taaub yia maiq haib zruj naaiq Euvg sig.
31.6: Toq Tinb huvb Ryav yia yem pcvb fim Eei Tinb pcvb Ryavj, ninb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia maiq zruj txvg.
31.34: weig zu'g yia kamb Riaj zwavj myenb Zamq, yaag kamb Riaj trub zov myenb mavg Piaj yia, yia zyrug maiq Ko lo yaag maiq Zwrtq kcvb Ka'Dau.
31.2: yem kub vwaaig Eei Tinb huvb xij pun yia tu'q Eei pwrng se haiq Euvg? yem Lav Eei txvj nrnb Jiaj uaq taub xij pun yia tu'q Ripg haiq Euvg?
31.36: yia zyrug an Jyenq yia Eei Ba'taub, yaag Dovj Jyenq Navq huvb nivq.
31.20: sij kxvq yia maiq pun ninb tu'q yia Eei pa'ki yuvb Eei pyei Tevj ninb syruq, ninb Eei Hruq zyrug maiq pwav waag pun yia,
31.24: “sij kxvq yia lovg Jyem zruj yia Kauj Eei txvj, cvj Buaj zyen Jyem, ‘meib penj yia Kauj wrnq Eei txvj,’
31.28: naaiq yaag penj syemq zwid Jyen xij zu'g tivg Eei zwid, weig zu'g yia maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yem Lav Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb.
31.7: “sij kxvq yia Eei zaub Biag yavb Pyen zyen Jauq, yia Eei Hruq yaag kan yia Eei mziv, sij kxvq yia Eei puad maaib haiq Euvg zwid kua'q Jyenq,
31.29: “sij kxvq yia pwatg Rxv yia uaq teij zu'g paaig, pwatg ninb Bua zu'g x'q sig zyrug Fyenb yrub a'Neiq,
31.19: sij kxvq yia pwatg haiq taub taig laaij maiq maaib lwib hruj zu'q, fai pwatg tavb tonj Eei myenb maiq maaib haiq Euvg Txvq sin,
31.17: sij kxvq yia kanb Eang yia maaib Eei ti'q tyen, kub hanb fu'Jweiq yaag maiq tu'q Eang,

31.31: sij kxvq yem yia Eei Dopg liub Eei myenb maiq kxvq, ‘maaib haiq taub maiq tu'q Eang ninb Eei zyruq Eei Eang hopq peuq?’
31.30: (yia zuvq maiq pun yia Eei Rwib paamd zwid, zyruj pun ninb zu'g taig),
31.27: yia Eei Hruq peig Diaq zu'g yua'g, yia Eei Rwib zom yia Eei puad pun Ziv Taaib ninb Bua,
31.11: Navq naaig za'kevb waaig Eei sig, syemq zwid Jyen zuvq xij zu'g tivg zwid,
31.5: “sij kxvq yia zruj Jaaq Eei Jauq, yia Eei zauj yaag syepg syepq Eei mivb Duaq myenb,
31.9: “sij kxvq yia Eei Hruq zu'g pcv mivb lxd msia'q txn, yia yaag pivj Jyenq yem yia Eei Jwavg laavd myenb Eei kcvb Daavg zuaq,
31.16: “sij kxvq yia vcvg Jyenq maiq Tevj tovb myenb Jomg myenb xij tu'q Eei, fai pun aub kwaaq Eei mziv pc'g pc'g mavg,

31.15: zeij yia yem maa Eei ka'sia uaq taub fib Navq Eei zeij ninb maiq zeid? yaag tovb naaiq taub Tinb huvb pun yia Bua yem maa Eei ka'sia zeij taaib maiq zeid?

31.25: sij kxvq yia weig yia maaib zinb zxib puvb zua'g, fai weig yia Eei puad zxng tu'q Zamq Fyenb yrub,

27.2: “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei Tinb huvb, tovb maiq pun yia tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid, se zyavq Jyenq nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, tovb pun yia Hruq mun uaq taub, hruq waag,
27.20: ninb zu'g kamb Riaj haig Eei sig Navq uam yemj nx. luvb mwrnd zang Ryaaub zung Lxq ninb mivb mig a'q.
27.7: “Toq pun yia Eei winb wavq Navq x'q myenb nx, yaag pun Zauj yia txib tekg uaq teij Navq maiq pcvb fim Eei myenb.
27.19: ninb pweij Fiag Eei zyavb hog ninb putq zxib Eei, mq paag Jiaj mivb maiq tu'q Navq naaig, ninb nuvj Gxi mziv, maiq pwatg Revg ninb Eei zinb zxib mig a'q.
27.17: maiq kunq ninb Dwi Jyenq, mq paag Kuq myenb tu'q zu'q, maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb tu'q pun Gxi ninb Eei Eaanb.
27.11: “yia xij Faauj meib Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q Dovg haaij Lo, nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Eei za'eij yia yaag maiq pivj.

27.9: ninb zu'g ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog, Tinb huvb xij mwavj ninb Toq Eei waag fai?
27.16: maiq kunq x'q myenb zxng Eaanb Dwi Jyenq Navq niab Buv, maaib lwib hruj Zamq zuvq zu'q maiq hivb,
27.4: yia Eei Rwib meij zuvq maiq kxvq Jaaq Eei waag, yia Eei Byetg yetg liud maiq kxvb pc'g.
27.10: ninb zyrug a'Neiq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub fai? ninb xij zanb zang heug Tinb huvb fai?
27.22: Ryaauj zx'q ninb zxi mivb yaag maiq Kxb lyenb. ninb Fiag Qa'q pyauj Ryaauj Eei Qa'q.
27.12: naaiq meib Bua yetg zuvq pwatg Jiaj. uaq Euvg meib Bua weig haiq tiug kxvq Zwrtq maiq lamb lovg Eei waag?
27.15: ninb zevg Fiag Eei myenb zuvq zu'g wrnb pcvg taig, ninb Bua Eei aub kwaaq yaag maiq Eyemq.
27.13: “naaiq se Tinb huvb pun x'q myenb tu'q Eei pwrng, se nrnb Jiaj uaq taub pun zeij myenb uaq teij Ripg Eei pwrng.

11.2: “kxvq waag Dovg naaig Zamq maiq zu'g tau fai? kxvq waag Zamq Eei myenb xij zu'g funj ninb hxpg Eei fai?

11.13: “sij kxvq meib Beng suv Hruq cvj suv Jyenq puad huvj Jyenq ninb,

11.1: naa-aa-me myenb, soj-faa, zyrug tau kxvq,
11.10: “sij kxvq Tinb huvb Jiaj mivb yaag zx'q meib wrnj Jyenq, cvj heug syemq zwid, haiq taub haib laanb ninb?

5.18: weig zu'g Tinb huvb pun zu'g mun, mq paag ninb peu Jyenq, ninb Bx'q, mq paag ninb Eei puad zxg lovj.
