5.14: yem luvb Nxi zang ninb Bua pwavb zu'g Mwavj, luvb aanj zang Waaj naaiq Waaj uaq Navq luvb mwrnd zang nx.
5.23: weig zu'g meib zruj Eei Deig zuvq maiq maaib la'pyeiq, yem Deig Eei Yiab zxib yaag xij Zauj meib hxpg.
5.6: ze'g naang maiq zeid yem niab Buv Zwrtq, Kwrnj naanb maiq zeid yem Daub Diaq putq Zwrtq taaib.
5.2: Qiaj Jiad Eei Jauq haib taij taig Vovj Eei myenb, mweig Jia'q Eei sig yaag taij taig Namq maiq hiuq haiq Euvg Eei myenb.
5.20: vxg Naavj Eei zyavb hog, ninb Fruj meib pyauj Dutq, maiq zu'g taig. Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog ninb Fruj pyauj Dutq Ru'g Daauq Eei Qa'q.
5.24: meib zyrug hiuq tu'q meib Eei Dopg liub yem lovj Eei. meib zaab mavg meib Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb yaag pwatg maiq Zaa haiq Euvg.
5.7: mq paag myenb Zwrtq seij zuvq zu'g pwavb Kwrnj naanb Navq trub fiv Daij faauj.
5.19: ninb xij Fruj meib pyauj Dutq Ju'q Rung ze'g naang, Tauj siag Rung ze'g naang, maiq maaib haiq Euvg hxig meib.
5.17: “Tinb huvb kxvb Faauj Eei myenb maaib xnb lx'g. weig naaiq maiq tuvq mavg Piaj nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Bx'q Faauj
5.27: “naaiq teij yetg zuvq yia Bua lovb lovj Eei zaab mavg liud a'q. mwavj maa'b! xij zu'g hiuq tu'q se weig Tevj meib tu'q lovj.”
5.11: ninb zx'q zruj faij Eei myenb prub faauj Lav, yaag pun Raub Eyemq Eei myenb tu'q yem lovj.
5.5: ninb syru Eei kcvb zwavj zu'g Hruq sia Eei myenb Eang, lyemb zyavb Jyenq Fimq ka'Euad yaag zx'q Revg. vxg Gaatq Eei myenb huvb huvb hcb hc Eei xij tu'q ninb Eei zinb zxib.
5.9: ninb zruj Lo Eei sig zuvq Namq maiq zaaig, yaag zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig zuvq saauq maiq hivb.
5.16: Navq naaig myenb Jomg myenb maaib lamb Namq txvj, maiq pcvb fim Eei myenb yaag Gapg Jyenq Rwib.
5.4: ninb Eei txn sia'q lxd maiq tu'q pcvb xn Eei txvj, yem zivb kcvb Daavg ninb Bua zu'g zeij, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj.
5.10: ninb pun Byuvg Fiag Daub peib, pun uam yuvd lyavb Deig.
5.22: meib pwavb zu'g myetg Eei sig Zauj vxg Naavj meib zyrug Kub Jyetq. meib yaag maiq kamb Riaj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib.
5.12: ninb Pxj waaig kuq kwaij myenb taaq Eei za'eij, ninb Bua Eei puad zyrug zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg.
5.15: mq paag Tinb huvb Fruj myenb Jomg myenb pyauj Dutq, maiq zu'g myenb zeij. pun tavb tonj Eei myenb pyauj Dutq myenb henq myenb Eei puad.
5.13: ninb pun Zovb mevb myenb zu'g ninb Bua kanb Eei za'eij Lopq ninb Bua, yaag pun kuq kwaij myenb Eei za'eij syepg syepq Eei zu'g myetg.
5.1: “yopq aa'b! ib zang kunq heug maa'b! maaib haiq taub tau meib? meib haib lxd haiq taub finb myenb Tevj?
5.26: meib Eei syrug Ewrnb Daauq, Havb Jeiq koj meib Zivj Tauj zruq, Navq Byaub zeiq Tauj zyavb hog syru.”
5.25: meib zuvq xij hiuq tu'q meib Eei funb fa'q xij Yaavj Zamq, meib Eei zeib fun yaag Dovg Daub peib Eei miaq.

9.18: ninb zuvq maiq pun yia Tauq Qiaj, taauj Rwrnj pun yia Eei mcvg Kruq Tauj Diaq.
9.8: ninb kanb Du'g taub Zxv luvb, yaag Zaaiq Kxiq Eei uamb laavg.
9.33: feij tu'q maaib taub yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj Tevj mwavj, yaag haib Tevj yia Bua i puv tunj sig.
9.3: sij kxvq haiq taub maaib Hruq xij Zauj ninb Rcv, ninb kxvq yetg Zin Rung, myenb yaag maiq haib tau yetg Rung.
9.32: “Tinb huvb maiq zeid paamb myenb Navq yia nx, yia zyrug maiq haib Zauj ninb zruj sig.
9.21: “yia maiq maaib txvj Gemb, mq paag yia maiq kunq kanb a'q. yia yruj haig yia Eei mcvg.
9.35: uaq Euvg yia zyrug kxvq waag yaag maiq kamb Riaj ninb, weig zu'g yia hiuq tu'q yia Eei Hruq maiq Navq naaig.
9.14: “uaq Euvg yia Navq haiq nx haib tau ninb? yia Navq haiq nx haib kinq waag Zauj ninb lwrnj?
9.23: myenb zu'g ze'g naang lyemb zeib taig, Tinb huvb Jyetq maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb pwavb Eei ze'g naang.
9.6: Tinb huvb Gamq paamb ken tovd Zwrtq ninb Eei txvj, Dau Eei Dyrub yaag tovd Revg.
9.34: Toq Tinb huvb zx'q Gxi ninb Eei pyaaq maiq Bx'q yia, yaag Toq maiq tuvq zruj kamb Riaj Eei sig hc'q yia.
9.2: “yia za'kevb hiuq tu'q se Navq naaig. mq paag myenb Navq haiq nx haib yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen penj zruj tu'q hxpg Eei myenb?
9.20: maiq kunq yia maiq txvg, yia kanb Eei Rwib xij tivg yia maaib zwid. maiq kunq yia maiq maaib txvj Gemb, ninb xij pun Ziv yia txvg.
9.24: Tinb huvb zx'q paamb ken Jiu pun yem x'q myenb Eei puab Diaq. ninb pwav Jyenq paamb ken syemq zwid myenb Eei Myen. sij kxvq maiq zeid ninb, penj haiq taub?
9.28: yia zyrug kamb Riaj yia Eei yetg zuvq Kruq naang, weig zu'g yia hiuq tu'q meib maiq funj yia maiq maaib txvg Eei txvj.
9.7: ninb hatg Ba'Nxi, Ba'Nxi zyrug maiq Zwrtq, ninb cvj pwav Jyenq zwavj Leij.
9.29: yia zuvq zu'g tivg zwid. uaq Euvg yia weig haiq tiug pc'g pc'g zruj Kruq?
9.19: sij kxvq saaij Qa'q, mavg maa'b! ninb Dovg haaij henq! sij kxvq weig syemq zwid Eei Jauq, haiq taub haib heug ninb taaib?
9.17: ninb lovg tomb Ryaauj pwrng Bx'q yia, pun yia zu'g mun Eei txvj Zamq Jyenq faauj yaag maiq maaib kxnb pcvj.
9.31: mq paag meib zxi yia Dxtq Kwrtq, lyemb yia Eei lwib hruj xij yruj yia.
9.30: sij kxvq yia lovg sxv Raauj sin, lovg Ria Eei uam Raauj puad,
9.27: sij kxvq yia kxvq, ‘yia xij la'Ku'q yia vopq Eei sig, yia xij kwavg Gxi Myen Raub Eei Jauq, zruj Fyenb yrub a'q,’
9.11: Tinb huvb yavb yia Eei ka'Len Jiaj, yia yaag mavg maiq pwatg. ninb yavb Ra'Myen mcvj Jiaj, yia yaag maiq hiuq.
9.5: “ninb Qiaj Jiad uaq zang, ninb zx'q Bov Byenq Rwrnj taaib. ninb swiq Bov, Bov zuvq maiq hiuq.
9.9: ninb zeij pa'tauq Leij Zauj siag muab sia'q Leij, faamb Ziv Leij Zauj naamb puv Eei Leij.
9.16: sij kxvq yia heug ninb, ninb yaag tau yia, yia zuvq maiq syenj ninb mwavj yia Eei Qiaj.
9.4: Tinb huvb Eei Hruq maaib Zovb mevb, ninb Eei Qa'q yaag henq. haiq taub haib vcvg Tinb huvb yaag vcvg tu'q hivb?
9.10: ninb zruj Lo haig Eei sig Jiaj Daavg yia Bua haib mevb pc'g, zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig zuvq saauq maiq hivb.
9.22: yetg zuvq fib Navq Revg. weig naaiq yia kxvq, maiq kunq maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei myenb Zauj x'q myenb, ninb myetg Revg mig a'q.
9.12: ninb zx'q ninb xij lovg Eei, maiq maaib haiq taub haib laanb ninb. haiq taub kaamq naaig ninb, ‘meib zruj haiq Euvg?’
9.15: maiq kunq yia maiq zruj txvg, yia yaag maiq haib tau ninb. yia xij zu'g Toq syemq yia uaq taub Kxb lyenb yia.
9.13: Tinb huvb maiq pun ninb Eei ka'Qiaj fiu, ninb pun Tevj laa-hapg uaq teij zu'g yem ninb Eei zaub Diaq.
9.26: yia Eei Nxi Jiaj syepq Navq syepq haig Eei Ravq nx, Navq tomb Jaavq Fiag syepq zx'q ka'naaiq Eang.
9.25: “yia Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiaj syepq Navq saaij Tiuj Eei myenb Tiuj nx. yia Eei Nxi lyemb zeib Jiaj mig a'q, yaag maiq pwatg haiq Euvg lovj.

16.18: “Dau aa'b! maiq tuvq pwav yia Eei Ryaamq. maiq tuvq pun yia heug Eei Qiaj maaib txvj hitq.
16.8: meib pun yia so'q, Jaig Revg, yia Dovg naaiq Jaig zyrug zruj zxvb zevj koj yia.
16.3: meib maiq tivb maiq hitq Eei kxvq waag maiq haib Jomg fai? maaib haiq Euvg Zua'q zu'g meib tau waag?
16.21: Toq pun ninb Tevj myenb Jrub Tinb huvb, Navq myenb Tevj ninb Eei lob kcv txig Jrub nx.
16.14: ninb Bx'q yia yetg Rung Jiaj yetg Rung, ninb Tiuj taaib Bx'q Navq Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv.
16.6: “maiq kunq yia kxvq waag, yia mun Eei Jauq maiq syeng. sij kxvq yia Eyend Jyenq maiq kxvq, yia mun Eei txvj maiq haib kaub lovj.
16.2: “naaiq Euvg waag yia haid Zamq! haig a'q. meib Bua taub taub xij xn Hruq mq paag meib Bua pun myenb Jaa Raub.
16.20: yia Eei lob kcv txig Wrtq yia, yia Eei mziv lyrug uamb mweig pun Tinb huvb.
16.7: Tinb huvb aag, ib zang meib zuvq pun yia Kwrnj Kruq. meib pun yia Eei pyauq zov myenb zu'g paaig Revg.
16.19: ib zang maaib taub yem Tinb txvb Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj, peu yia uaq taub yem Lav Eei txvj.
16.17: maiq kunq yia Eei puad maiq zruj haiq Euvg to'g, yia tauj kauj Eei waag yaag Zivb Revg.
16.11: Tinb huvb zx'q yia Jiu pun x'q myenb, yaag zxi yia yem myenb waaig myenb Eei puab Diaq.
16.5: mq paag yia haib lovg yia Eei Rwib Zeij meib Bua henq Jiad taaib, yia Eei Rwib meij yaag xij xn meib Bua Eei yrub Raub.
16.9: Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad Jyenq petq yia yaag Rxv yia, txv Jyenq yia vaatg Eaab. yia Eei winb wavq Fatg mziv mavg yia.
16.16: weig zu'g yia Eyemq, Myen si'q Revg, mzivb Dopq yaag Mwavj,
16.4: sij kxvq meib Bua Zauj yia Tiuq txvj yem, yia mq paag haib kxvq Navq meib Bua nx. yia haib px'q Jyenq yetg Kav Jiaj yetg Kav Eei waag kxvq meib Bua, cvj txv Jyenq meib Bua Wavj mGxvq.
16.10: ninb Bua mxvj Rwib pun yia. ninb Bua Baij yia Eei Myen Wrtq yia. ninb Bua kapq zunq taaib xij zruj pun yia.
16.22: “weig zu'g cvj Jiaj liud i ziaj Havj, yia zyrug kan maiq Rwrnj Eei Jauq mivb.
16.12: yia Kub yem Eei zyavb hog ninb zx'q yia wrtq nauq. ninb nanq Jyenq yia Eei Jaav kwc'q yia mwrng Revg. ninb zx'q yia zruj ninb Eei Bc'g.
16.15: “yia lunb la'maab Diab Zru nitq Jyenq yia Eei Dopq, yia swei Revg zyrug pweij Jyenq niab Buv.
16.13: ninb Eei pwrnq Jwavb zinj myenb weib kxmj yia. ninb pwrnq Tov yia Eei Eutg zeiq yaag maiq Kxb lyenb, yaag toj yia Eei taamq Zwrtq Fiag Dau.

41.18: ninb Ziuq zyrug maaib Fav Fapg tavb Zwrtq taaib. ninb Eei mziv Navq luvb Dxm Ryruq Eei Favb laavg.
41.8: lovg meib Eei puad mua'q ninb, haiq zang Javj zu'g meib Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj, meib yetg liud maiq cvj zruj a'q.
41.33: yem luvb Diaq maiq maaib haiq Euvg Navq ninb. ninb penj zeij Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq, yaag maiq kamb Riaj haiq Euvg.
41.3: ninb xij Qa'q Toq meib Kxb lyenb Eei fai? ninb xij lovg swrng Eei waag Zauj meib kxvq?
41.32: ninb Jiaj mivb Eei Jauq Ga'haaq mcvj Zwrtq Fav Fapg Fapg Eei, myenb zyrug Namq taaib Kxiq Do Eei txvj maaib Ba'pyei pc'g.
41.21: ninb pyomq Qiaj pun trub Taanj zia'g, ninb Eei Rwib Zwrtq trub Byetg.
41.14: haiq taub haib mc'q Gxi ninb Eei Rwib pcvj? Wiv kxmj ninb Eei Rwib Eei Eaab hc'q myenb kamb Riaj haig.
41.23: ninb Eei xb Riu Zi'q Jyenq Jaaj zyetg Eei, vcvg Eei, Navq toj taaib Eei Lia'q nx, Gamq maiq tovd.
41.6: zx'q Byaud myenb txb ninb taaib kxvq Jaab zinb, scvb eij myenb zyrug zx'q ninb pun Gxi fai?
41.34: ninb mavg Euvb Euvg yem Lav Eei ka'naaiq. ninb zruj zwavj Yiab zxib Eei huvb.”
41.2: meib haib lovg Laav Zunj ninb Eei Ba'zxv, fai lovg vau Kwavj ninb Eei haab paab fai?
41.20: ninb Eei Ba'zxv Zwrtq trub syruj, Navq Zcv Bweij Zauj zia'g Jyenq Eei lua'g ti'g kwcvq nx.
41.24: ninb Eei Hruq vcvg Navq la'pyeiq, Navq ka'Diaq mcvj mxg.
41.28: fxv hc'q maiq tu'q ninb pyauj, puvj la'pyeiq Eei Dopg Laav weig ninb txvj Byaub Gaauq kxn.
41.7: meib haib lovg Zavb fru Zunj ninb Eei Dopq, fai lovg Ropq Byaud Zav Ropq ninb Eei mGxvq fai?
41.29: Dyavb Donj txvj Byaub Gaauq kxn, ninb yaag Jyetq piu Zav Eei Qiaj Bwi.
41.19: ninb Eei Rwib Zwrtq trud Navq trub paaq, yaag maaib trub fiv Daij Zwrtq.
41.17: Jiaj kitq Jyenq Jaaj, yetg Kwaaiq lapq yetg Kwaaiq, maiq haib mc'q maiq Gxi.
41.31: ninb pun Do Eei uam Bweij Navq Zcv Bweij, pun Kxiq Navq Zcv ka'Euad Eei Diab yrub.
41.30: ka'sia Do'q Eei Jiaj laig Navq niab mx huq. ninb lwib Jyenq kan uamb pamg Jiaj Navq Eweib Byaub Eei Jaab sig.
41.27: weig ninb nx, Lia'q txvj Byaub Gaauq, tovb si'q txvj Dyavb latq.
41.11: maaib haiq taub pun haiq Euvg yia, tovb yia xij zu'g winb pun ninb? luvb Diaq Eei maang mwrtg yetg zuvq se yia Eei.
41.5: meib haib zx'q ninb txvj nx'g lovg a'Ryaaug, fai Dob Jyenq Laav Ken Duaq meib Eei sia'g lunj a'Neiq fai?
41.9: myenb maaib lamb Namq xij zx'q ninb mq paag maiq zeid a'q, taan pwatg ninb Navq, taamq mapq a'q, Kiv Fiag Dau.
41.16: naaiq teij Jiaj yetg Kwaaiq kapq yetg Kwaaiq Dipg haig, Qiaj zuvq maiq haib Jiaj Bu'Dovb Qavj.
41.4: ninb xij Zauj meib lyepg vcvg waag, lcvd yetg liud zruj meib Eei nrub?
41.10: maiq maaib haiq taub Zyruq kauj Zua'q ninb. uaq Euvg, haiq taub haib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen sruq tu'q wrnq?
41.22: ninb Eei Jaav za'kevb henq haig, ta'faanb pwavb ninb uaq teij kamb Riaj! haig.
41.12: “yia yaag maiq Eyend Jyenq maiq kxvq Tauj ninb Eei puab zauj, fai ninb Eei tomb Qa'q fai ninb Eei sin lyrug.
41.15: ninb Eei ti'g taand Eei Jiaj penj yetg lyrud yetg lyrud Navq Txvb paaib nx, nitq Jyenq Jaaj ma'g Eei, kapq Jyenq Dipg Eei Navq la'pyeiq nx vcvg.
41.13: haiq taub haib Ziaq ninb Eei ka'Eiag uaq yemg lwi? haiq taub haib Ropq pia'g ninb Eei i yemg Lia'g lwi?
41.1: “yopq aa'b! meib haib lovg tiuj zx'q le-wi-aa-Taan, fai lovg Laav Dob ninb Eei Byetg fai?
41.26: maiq kunq lovg Ru'g Daauq Ropq, yaag hxig maiq zu'g ninb, lyemb Ropq Eei Zav Zauj piu Eei Zav yaag hxig maiq zu'g ninb.
41.25: ninb Jiad sin, myenb henq myenb kamb Riaj, ninb zruj Zyruq, ninb Bua Hruq waaig Revg.

37.18: meib haib Navq Tinb huvb Zxv luvb, yaag pun luvb vcvg Navq Raatq taaib Eei tovb si'q kivj fai?
37.8: Yiab zxib pia'g ninb Bua Eei zunb, yaag yem ninb Bua Eei Kwrtq ka'Euad.
37.3: ninb puvj Ba'livg Zwrtq pwavq luvb Diaq, ninb Eei Ba'livg mivb Jomg luvb kxn.
37.21: ib zang Ryaauj pwrng Bwrnj mivb, luvb zyrug Rav, Fav cvq Jyenq, paamb myenb zyrug maiq haib mavg luvb Eei Fav.
37.14: “yopq aa'b! tivb Jyenq lovb lovj Eei mwavj Tauj Tinb huvb zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig.
37.23: “yia Bua maiq haib mivb nitq fatq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub. ninb maaib tomb Qa'q, maaib pcvb fim, ninb zruj tu'q hxpg haig, yaag maiq zeij myenb.
37.6: weig zu'g ninb Buaj sxv, ‘twib Fiag Daub peib maa'b!’ yaag Buaj Byuvg Zauj Byuvb Ryaauj, ‘xij zu'g henq a'q.’
37.2: mwavj maa'b! mwavj Tinb huvb Eei Qiaj Bwi Navq Ba'ov nx, mwavj yem ninb Eei Rwib Zwrtq Funb Funb Eei Qiaj.
37.20: xij zu'g Buaj ninb, yia xij Zauj ninb kxvq waag fai? maaib haiq laanb myenb kanb xij Toq zu'g myetg?
37.24: weig naaiq myenb Taaib ninb. ta'faanb Zev kanb maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb ninb maiq Taaib a'q.”
37.7: ninb pun taub taub myenb Eei puad tivb Fiag, weig pun zeij taaib Eei maang myenb hiuq tu'q ninb Eei kov.
37.19: “Toq Faauj yia Bua, yia Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx Zauj Tinb huvb kxvq. yia Bua Hruq Vovj, Namq maiq Zwrtq waag kxvq.
37.17: naamb puv Eei Ryaauj pun Dau Jxm zovb zovg Eei, meib yua'q, lwib hruj Navq trud nx Jxm.
37.11: ninb pun Bwrnb hod maaib uam pwavq Revg, pun Ba'livg yem Bwrnj faatq Zwrtq.
37.5: Tinb huvb Eei Qiaj Bwi Zwrtq haid Bua'g hxvb haig. ninb zruj Lo haig Eei sig, yia Bua zuvq maiq haib pia'g Hruq.
37.9: Ryaaub Jia'q yem naamb puv Zwrtq taaib, Jwavq Eei Qiaj yem pa'q puv Eei Ryaauj Zwrtq.
37.16: meib hiuq tu'q Bwrnj Navq haiq nx Byrub Jyenq Daamb luvb Eei fai? se maaib tunb yunb Eei wrnb zaav uaq taub zruj Eei Bua'g hxvb sig.
37.4: Ga'haaq maaib ninb Eei Qiaj Funb Jyenq taaib, ninb maaib haavb taaub Eei Qiaj Navq Ba'ov nx Bwi, ninb Eei Qiaj Bwi uaq zang, ninb maiq tavq Jyenq Ba'livg.
37.10: Tinb huvb Eei Qiaj pun uam kitq sxv, uamb Taan yaag kitq vcvg Revg.
37.22: yem pa'q puv maaib Favb laavg Zwrtq Navq Jyem nx, Tinb huvb taaib yaag maaib kamb Riaj Eei haavb taaub.
37.12: ziuj Tinb huvb Paaiq, ninb Bua kwinb mivb kwinb taaib, yrub kxmj luvb Diaq zruj zyavj ei Jyenq ninb hatg Eei yetg zuvq.
37.15: meib hiuq Eei fai? Tinb huvb Navq haiq nx hatg naaiq teij ka'naaiq, pun Ba'livg yem Bwrnj ka'Euad ziuj Zwrtq?
37.13: ninb pun naaiq teij Jauq Zwrtq taaib weig tivg zwid fai weig yuvd Daub peib, fai weig zu'g ninb zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb.
37.1: “naaiq teij sig pun yia Eei Ba'Riu tovd Bokg Bokg Eei, Dang zu'g yia Eei wrnb Daij, taamq mapq Revg.

39.18: mq paag ninb yav Jyenq Daatq Tiuj uaq zang, ninb Jyetq maad Zauj keb maad Eei myenb.
39.8: ninb yrub kxmj Bov penj ninb Eei miab Zyavq, ninb Qa'q lxd Euvb Euvg miab mcv Eang.
39.3: meib hiuq tu'q ninb Bua haiq zang Baapq Fiag, pun ninb Bua Eei txn Dxtq Dau fai?
39.21: ninb yem uaq hxvd Eaaiq Dau, yaag a'Neiq ninb Eei Qa'q, ninb Zwrtq mivb pwavb txb Jyenq ua'g king Eei pcv.
39.14: nx'g lxb Txb Daug Jauj kwavg uaq Dau, pun Dau Tevj ninb Eei Jauj syruq.
39.23: keb maad myenb pwij Eei fxvb Dovb scb scq Eei Bwi, yaag maaib Zavb Daauq Zavb navq Fapg Fapg Eei.
39.6: yia zx'q Daub Waav penj ninb Eei pyauq, pun Daub Raaib penj ninb yem Eei txvj.
39.2: ninb maaib Jyenq txn Eei Laab Eia'g meib haib saauq Eei fai? haiq zang Fiag txn meib hiuq Eei?
39.20: meib pun ninb piu Navq Jopg Eeig, pun ninb Tauq Qiaj Bwi hc'q myenb kamb Riaj?
39.24: ninb Zyrub Zyruq Eei Eaaiq Dau yaag Tiuj Jyenq mivb, yetq haid Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi ninb sruq tivg maiq tu'q a'q.
39.28: ninb yem Lav Jiaj Eei Bcvj zruj ninb Eei pyauq, pavg Bcvb nivq zruj ninb wrnq Eei txvj.
39.7: ninb Jyetq zivb Zob Zob Eei Qiaj, maiq haid zung scvb Kuq Eei myenb heug Eei Qiaj Bwi.
39.29: yem naaiq ninb mavg Jyenq zx'q ka'naaiq Eang, ninb Eei mziv mavg tu'q pwatg ko Eei.
39.19: “yopq aag, se meib pun maad henq fai? se meib pun maad Eei Jaav maaib Rov Daauq fai?
39.17: weig zu'g Tinb huvb maiq pun ninb maaib Zovb mevb, yaag maiq pun ninb haib pia'g Hruq.
39.30: ninb Eei txn sx'q Ryaamq, zu'g taij Eei myenb Eei sei yem haaij, tomb Jaavb vovb yaag yem uaq.”
39.27: se meib Paaiq tomb Jaavq Daij faauj, yem Lav Eei txvj zruj laud fai?
39.11: weig zu'g ninb maaib Qa'q henq meib haib Kauj ninb fai? meib zx'q meib Eei kovb Niaq Jiu pun ninb zruj?
39.5: “haiq taub puvj Yiab lxb? haiq taub Jaiq ninb Eei Laav?
39.9: “Yiab vovb Kavq fub suj meib fai? ninb xij yem meib Eei miab zob ka'Len pweij Jiaj mwrnd fai?
39.16: ninb zruj to'g pun ninb Eei txn, Navq maiq zeid penj ninb kanb Eei txn nx. maiq kunq ninb Dxtq Qa'q, ninb yaag maiq Kxb fi'q,
39.4: ninb Bua Eei txn henq Jyenq faauj, yem lomb Waav Lo taaib. ninb Bua kwavg maa mivb yaag maiq Rwrnj.
39.10: meib haib lovg Laav Dob Jyenq Yiab vovb laib Dau fai? ninb xij kan meib paab ywrnb Komq Eei txvj fai?
39.22: ninb Jyetq kamb Riaj Eei sig, ninb kanb maiq kamb Riaj, pwatg Ru'g Daauq, ninb yaag maiq Twij Rwrnj.
39.12: meib puvj Hruq ninb txb meib Eei laavb zi'g Rwrnj taaib? yaag syru meib Eei Byaub Tauj Bx'q Byaub Eei Zyavq?
39.15: ninb maiq Namq Tauj haib zu'g zauj Zaaiq huq, fai Yiab zxib haib Zaaiq waaig.
39.13: “nx'g lxb Txb Fyenb yrub Eei yaapq Daatq, mq paag sin Eei pyei Zauj Daatq Eei pyei peiq maiq Tauj nx'g Eiab Eei.
39.1: “la'pyeib Bcvj Eei Yiab yuvb haiq zang Fiag txn, meib hiuq Eei fai? Faib Eeid Fiag txn meib pwatg Jiaj Eei?
39.26: “tomb Jaavq yav Daatq Daij, huvj Jyenq naamb puv mivb, naaiq se pavg meib Eei Zovb mevb zruj fai?
39.25: Jxv Eei Qiaj haiq zang Bwi ninb heug, ‘hcq hcq,’ ninb yem ko Eei Nomq zu'g Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj, yaag haid Junb pcvb pyeiq Zauj heug Eei Qiaj Bwi.

4.18: Tinb huvb zuvq maiq puvj Hruq ninb Eei pru, yaag koj ninb Eei finb myenb zruj txvg,
4.3: Namq mavg kaaj meib kanb Faauj myenb Zamq, yaag Tevj mau Eei puad henq Jiad taaib.
4.8: yia pwatg Jiaj, zruj x'q  haad waaig sig Eei Eim Eei myenb, zyrug Navq uaq nx syru.
4.19: Navq naaig ninb kaub maiq puvj Hruq lovg nia zruj taaib Eei paamb myenb, se maaib niab Buv zruj kxnb Do'q yaag haib zu'g myetg Navq pc'g yia'g.
4.9: Tinb huvb pyomq Qiaj pun ninb Bua zu'g myetg, ninb Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun ninb Bua zutg Revg.
4.7: “Namq mavg kaaj! maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb maaib haiq taub zu'g myetg Jiaj Eei fai? maaib haiq taub Hruq zivj Eei myenb zu'g Pai kwavg?
4.5: mq paag ib zang ze'g naang Tauj meib, meib zyrug maiq maaib nxig, ze'g naang zu'g meib, meib zyrug Hruq mau a'q.
4.16: Ryaauj tivb yaag maaib Euvg yem uaq, mq paag yia mavg maiq Zwrtq ninb Eei favj zeiq. yia Eei mziv pwatg Euvg ka'naaiq Eei favj, sekq Ria'g Eei. Ga'haaq yia haid Qiaj kxvq,
4.20: yem luvb Dxm Tauj luvb Mwavj Bu'Dovj ninb Bua zu'g myetg, yetg liud maiq maaib haiq taub liug leid.
4.17: ‘paamb myenb haib yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen pcvb fim Eei fai? paamb myenb haib yem zeij ninb taaib uaq taub Eei Ra'Myen Zivb Revg Eei fai?
4.14: hc'q yia kamb Riaj, sin zinj, pun yia zyavb sin Eanb Eanb Eei.
4.4: meib Eei waag paaq Jyenq Di'q zu'g Dxpg Eei myenb, meib yaag Tevj mau Eei Zivb Bx'g henq Jiad taaib.
4.21: sij kxvq yem ninb Bua Eei Dopg liub ka'Euad Eei Laav zu'g pcv Zwrtq, ninb Bua zyrug maiq taig yaag maiq maaib Zovb mevb fai?’
4.2: “sij kxvq myenb Zauj meib kxvq Jruj waag, meib tiaq tu'q Eei fai? mq paag haiq taub haib Eyend Jyenq maiq kxvq?
4.6: meib Taaib Tinb huvb zyrug pun meib maaib lamb Kauj maiq zeid? meib zruj Eei sig maiq maaib txvj Gemb, zyrug pun meib maaib lamb Namq maiq zeid?
4.13: txij yia luvb mwrnd zang mFxmb Do Eei zyavb hog, Beij Beij maiq penj, Namq naaiq Namq uaq,
4.12: “maaib Jruj waag sekg sekq Eei Tauj yia, yia Eei mnxmb haid naaiq teij waab sapq,
4.15: maaib kxv Ryaauj zu'g yia Eei Myen, yia Eei sinb pyei Jiad Revg.
4.11: syenb henq maiq maaib ka'naaiq zx'q Eang zyrug taig mig a'q. syenb Eeid Eei txn yaag zu'g Raanj Revg.
4.10: syenb heug Eei Qiaj Zauj syenb Zyruq Eei Qiaj sekq, syenb lunj Eei Eaab zu'g nauq.

10.18: “Tinb huvb aa'b! meib weig haiq tiug txb yia Zwrtq maa Eei ka'sia? feij tu'q yia taig Daavg myenb Eei mziv pwatg yia,
10.8: “meib Eei puad nanq yia, zeij yia Zwrtq taaib, ib zang meib taauj Gaav taaib xij myetg yia.
10.3: meib zeij myenb cvj mavg Piaj meib Eei puad zeij taaib Eei ka'naaiq, yaag Zev x'q myenb Eei za'eij, naaiq teij sig meib haid hxpg Eei fai?
10.21: Daavg yia mivb maiq Rwrnj Eei txvj, se mivb yemb ken, mapq Mwavj Eei teib puv.
10.14: sij kxvq yia paamd zwid meib mavg Jyenq yia. meib zuvq xij tivg yia Eei zwid, maiq puvj kwavg.
10.6: Navq naaig meib Zivj taaib lxd yia zruj txvg Eei sig, cvj zimb lxd yia Eei zwid,
10.2: yia xij kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, maiq tuvq tivg yia maaib zwid. Toq pun yia hiuq meib weig haiq tiug Zauj yia Rcv.
10.20: yia zyavb seij Eei Nxib Eia'g zo'g haig maiq zeid? Toq puvj yia kanb yem, pun yia tu'q teij Fyenb yrub
10.7: maiq kunq meib hiuq tu'q yia maiq maaib txvg Eei txvj, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Fruj yia pyauj Dutq meib Eei puab Diaq.
10.19: zyrug Navq maiq maaib Jiaj yia, se yem maa Eei ka'sia mivb Tauj zruq mig a'q.
10.17: meib cvj Jaa lyepg zxvb zevj myenb taaib koj yia, yaag Jaa Qiaj Jiad yia. meib txb syavb Junb pcv Tiuq Jyenq Bx'q yia.
10.11: meib lovg Dopq Zauj xq penj lwi pun yia zu'q, yaag lovg Buvq Zauj Jaan taauj Jyenq.
10.5: meib Eei Nxi Navq paamb myenb Eei Nxi fai? meib Eei Havj yaag Navq myenb Eei Havj fai?
10.9: Toq Javj Jyenq meib lovg pa'naib nia zeij yia, meib Zxg xij pun yia Rwrnj penj niab Buv fai?
10.16: sij kxvq yia prub yia kanb faauj, meib zung yia Navq syenb zung nx. meib cvj zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig hxig yia.
10.4: meib Eei mziv Navq paamb myenb Eei mziv fai? meib pwatg Navq paamb myenb pwatg fai?
10.10: meib toj yia Zwrtq taaib Navq Exj, cvj pun yia kitq taaib Navq Exb Meib vcvg maiq zeid?
10.22: naaiq nxm teib puv se Mwavj haig, lung Revg, yem uaq Eei Fav yaag Mwavj mig a'q.”
10.12: meib pun yia maaib mcvg zyavb yaag zyepg zua'q Eei Namq yia. meib yaag lovb lovj Eei peu Jyenq yia Eei mcvg.
10.15: sij kxvq yia zruj x'q, yia zu'g Kruq a'q. sij kxvq yia zruj hxpg, yia Zau maiq Jiad mGxvq. yia za'kevb! Eaiq Revg, yaag mavg Jyenq yia kanb Eei Kruq naang.
10.13: “mq paag naaiq teij sig meib pivj Jyenq yem Hruq, yia yaag hiuq tu'q naaiq se meib Eei za'eij a'q.
10.1: “yia yruj haig yia Eei mcvg, yia zyrug sweib Jyenq kxvq yia Eei naang zivb. yia Hruq ka'Euad Kruq zyrug xij kxvq a'q.

22.18: mq paag Tinb huvb Zxg pun lovj Eei ka'naaiq pwavq Revg ninb Bua Eei pyauq. x'q myenb Namq Eei Jauq yia yaag maiq haib mevb pc'g.
22.8: meib lovg meib Eei hatg maad tu'q livb teig, maaib mevb taub Eei myenb tu'q yem naaig.
22.3: sij kxvq meib zruj Kuq myenb, haib zruj pun nrnb Jiaj uaq taub a'Neiq fai? fai sij kxvq meib zruj tunb yunb Eei myenb, haib pun Tinb huvb tu'q haiq Euvg?
22.21: “yopq aag, meib xij zu'g Zauj Tinb huvb zruj hxpg, Zauj ninb pcvb xn, Tinb huvb zyrug pun meib tu'q lovj.
22.14: Bwrnb hod om Jyenq ninb, ninb zyrug mavg maiq pwatg. ninb yaag yrub luvb kub vwaaig.’
22.23: sij kxvq meib Rwrnj taaib lxd nrnb Jiaj uaq taub meib zyrug tu'q Zeij Jiad Navq lod uaq nx. sij kxvq meib kwavg x'q sig leib meib Eei Dopg liub ko,
22.6: meib aapq kxb yrud an txvb taaub yaag maiq maaib kxnb pcvj. zuvq zx'q Revg ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj pun ninb Bua lcvb kcvq Eei yem.
22.2: “myenb haib weig Tinb huvb maaib lamb lovg Eei fai? Zovb mevb myenb weig ninb maaib lamb lovg Eei fai?
22.20: kxvq, ‘Bua Eei winb wavq Dovg haaij zuvq zu'g Pai kwavg. ninb Bua zevg Fiag Eei ka'naaiq zu'g trud puaq Qwi Revg.’
22.24: sij kxvq meib zx'q Jyem kwavg Jyenq niab Buv, zx'q o-fi Eei zyen Jyem kwavg uaq Do'g zwrnj Eei la'pyeib Qavj,
22.28: meib tivg Hruq zruj haiq Euvg, meib zyrug haib zruj tu'q Zwrtq Eei. Fav yaag xij ziuj meib Eei Jauq.
22.7: Kruq Eei myenb meib maiq pun uam ninb Bua hopq, Hruq sia Eei myenb meib yaag maiq pun Naavj Eang.
22.29: weig zu'g Tinb huvb zatq Jyenq zruj mauj Eei myenb, mq paag Fruj Eyemg kanb zruj faij Eei myenb.
22.19: “Kuq myenb pwatg ninb Bua zu'g paaig zyrug a'Neiq, maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb yaag Kub Jyetq
22.17: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj Tinb huvb, ‘leib Gxi yia Bua maa'b!’ yaag kxvq, ‘nrnb Jiaj uaq taub haib zruj haiq Euvg pun yia Bua?’
22.30: lyemb zruj txvg Eei myenb ninb yaag xij Fruj. sij kxvq meib zruj tu'q hxpg meib zyrug tu'q Fruj.”
22.27: meib zyrug tauj kauj Jrub ninb, ninb yaag xij mwavj meib. meib yaag Jaauq suv meib lcvd Eei vcvg waag.
22.11: Mwavj om Jyenq meib, meib zyrug mavg maiq pwatg, uam yaag yemj Jyenq meib.
22.5: se meib zruj Eei x'q sig Lo haig maiq zeid? meib zruj Eei zwid yaag maiq maaib Jomg Eei txvj.
22.9: meib zung aub kwaaq Kuvb puad pc'g zauj Eei Rwrnj yaag zruj to'g kub hanb fu'Jweiq.
22.16: maiq kcvb Tauj taig Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua zu'g zx'q mivb mig a'q. ninb Bua Eei kxnb Do'q zu'g uam kwaatq mivb.
22.4: “se weig zu'g meib Taaib ninb, ninb Zivj kxvq meib yaag syemq meib Eei zwid fai?
22.10: weig naaiq maaib muvd zcv weib kxmj meib. meib Javj maiq zaaig Eei zyavb hog lyemb zeib zu'g kamb Riaj Eei sig.
22.22: xij zu'g zipq ninb Eei Rwib Faauj Eei waag, syru ninb Eei waag yem meib Eei Hruq ka'Euad.
22.12: “Tinb huvb maiq zeid yem kub vwaaig luvb Lav Eei txvj fai? mavg Lav Jiaj Eei Leij, ninb Bua Dovg haaij Lav!
22.15: “meib Zxg xij kan lob Jauq fai? naaiq se x'q myenb yavb Jiaj Eei Jauq.

22.26: Navq naaiq meib zyrug a'Neiq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub yaag Zau Myen lxd Tinb huvb.
22.25: sij kxvq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub penj meib Eei Jyem, yaag penj meib Jaaij haig Eei Eaanb,

12.18: ninb Jaiq Gxi huvb tiaj Dob myenb Eei limg, cvj lovg Laav sai Jyenq huvb Eei Jaaiq.
12.8: Zauj Dau kxvq waag, Dau zyrug Faauj meib, yem Kxiq Eei Byaud yaag xij zunb mevb Buaj meib.
12.3: mq paag yia yaag maaib Zovb mevb Zauj meib Bua fib Navq Eei. yia maiq kaub aiq meib Bua. meib Bua kxvq naaiq teij sig fuvg maaib haiq taub maiq hiuq lcb?
12.21: ninb mavg Piaj zruj Lo Eei myenb, yaag zx'q Gxi henq uaq teij Eei Qa'q.
12.14: Tinb huvb Zc'q Eei, maiq maaib haiq taub haib Zeij Jiad. ninb wrnj myenb, maiq maaib haiq taub haib puvj.
12.23: ninb pun kua'q henq, yaag myetg ninb Bua. ninb pun pc'g fivj Yaavj Zamq, cvj kwaatq ninb Bua mivb.
12.6: Janb za'g Eei Dopg liub pcvb xn Eei, Zua'q Tinb huvb Eei myenb yem tu'q wrnq, maiq kunq ninb Bua lovg kanb Eei Qa'q txvj zyenb.
12.2: “zeid a'q, meib Bua za'kevb kwai haig Eei myenb. Zovb mevb yaag xij Zauj meib Bua yetg Fiag taig.
12.20: ninb pun zyepg zua'q Eei myenb sekq Ria'g, maiq haib kxvq waag, yaag zx'q Gxi myenb koj Eei Zovb mevb.
12.24: ninb zx'q luvb Diaq pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq Eei Zovb mevb mivb mig a'q, yaag pun ninb Bua yrub Jyenq kan maiq maaib Jauq Eei teib puvb Waav mivb.
12.7: “kunq naaig scvb Kuq, scvb Kuq zyrug Faauj meib. naaig yem luvb Eei nx'g, ninb Bua zyrug Buaj meib.
12.19: ninb zx'q sai myenb lcvb kcvq Eei txb mivb, yaag Byenq maaib livg maaib Qa'q Eei myenb.
12.17: ninb se zx'q Revg Zaavb laavb myenb Eei Zovb mevb, yaag pun syemq zwid Jyen penj ka'naaib Vovj.
12.11: mnxmb maiq zeid haib seij waag Navq Byetg seij Eang hopq Eei mweij fai?
12.5: xnb lx'g Eei myenb yem Hruq mavg Piaj zu'g ze'g naang Eei myenb, ze'g naang zuvq zuaq Jyenq zauj Ba'g Pyatq Eei myenb.
12.9: yem naaiq teij yetg zuvq maaib haiq Euvg maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq Eei puad Navq naaiq zruj?
12.16: Tinb huvb maaib Qa'q, maaib Zovb mevb, zu'g Duaq Eei Zauj Duaq myenb Eei myenb yem ninb Eei puab Diaq.
12.4: “yia penj yia Eei txig Jyetq Eei ka'naaiq. zinb Daavg yia Jrub Tinb huvb, ninb yaag tau yia. yia se pcvb fim, maiq lamb Gemb txvj Eei myenb, yaag zu'g myenb Jyetq a'q.
12.10: ta'faanb zyavb Jyenq maaib mcvg Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zwavj paambb myenb Tauq Eei Qiaj yem ninb Eei puad.
12.22: ninb pun yem Do, Mwavj Eei sig hing Zwrtq, yaag txb mapq Mwavj Eei txvj pia'g Fav.
12.12: myenb koj myenb maaib Zovb mevb. syrug Ewrnb Daauq Eei myenb kaub haib pia'g Hruq.
12.15: sij kxvq ninb tavq Jyenq uam, uam zyrug Gaai. sij kxvq ninb puvj uam Zwrtq, uam zyrug yemj Daub peib.
12.13: “Tinb huvb maaib Zovb mevb Zauj Qa'q. ninb maaib za'eij yaag haib pia'g Hruq.
12.25: ninb Bua yem Mwavj ka'Euad Waaj Jyenq mivb, maiq maaib Fav. ninb yaag pun ninb Bua luvb luvb laib laib Navq tiuq Gwin Eei myenb nx.

42.3: meib naaig, ‘naaiq haiq taub lovg maiq maaib wrnb zaav Eei myenb kem Jyenq yia Eei za'eij?’ weig naaiq yia kxvq yia maiq mevb pc'g Eei sig, se Bua'g hxvb haig Eei sig, zuvq Jiaj Daavg yia haib hiuq Eei.
42.8: ib zang meib Bua xij zu'g txb siag taub vovb kruq Zauj siag taub yuvb kruq mivb Tauj yia Eei pru, yopq, uaq, weig meib Bua kanb fovg hxg puaq ziag. yia Eei pru, yopq, zyrug weig meib Bua tauj kauj, weig zu'g yia xij zipq ninb tauj kauj Eei waag, maiq ziuj meib Bua zruj Vovj Eei Jauq winb pun meib Bua. weig zu'g meib Bua kxvq yia uaq teij waag se maiq hxpg, maiq Navq yia Eei pru, yopq, kxvq nx.”
42.9: Te-maan myenb, e-li-fatq, Zauj Qu-waa myenb, Bin-Datg, Zauj naa-aa-me myenb, soj-faa, zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj. zyruq yaag zipq yopq tauj kauj Eei waag.
42.7: zyruq Zauj yopq kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, zyruq kxvq Buaj Te-maan myenb, e-li-fatq, “yia Qiaj Jiad meib Zauj meib Eei i taub lob kcv txig, weig zu'g meib Bua kxvq yia uaq teij waag se maiq hxpg, maiq Navq yia Eei pru, yopq, kxvq nx.
42.5: zinb Daavg yia Eei mnxmb haid myenb kxvq Tauj meib, mq paag ib zang yia Eei mziv tu'q pwatg meib.
42.16: Ga'haaq yopq cvj zyavb Jyenq yetg pc'q feij zyepg Havj yaag tu'q pwatg ninb Eei txn Zauj ninb Eei funb fa'q Fiag Tauj pyei txig myenb.
42.17: yopq zyavb tu'q syrug Ewrnb Daauq, Havb Jeiq koj ninb kwei seij mig a'q.
42.14: ninb Tevj sia'g Lo Zwrtq Buaj heug ye-mi-maa, ta'Eeig taub sia'q Eei Buaj heug Ke-si-yaa, ta'faam taub sia'q Eei Buaj heug Ke-len-hapg-pukg.
42.4: meib kxvq, ‘mwavj yia maa'b! yia xij kxvq. yia xij naaig meib, Toq meib tau yia.’
42.2: “yia hiuq tu'q maang sig meib haib zruj Eei, meib Eei za'eij maiq maaib haiq Euvg haib tavq tu'q Jyenq.
42.6: weig naaiq yia yruj yia kanb, yaag kxiq Hruq zweid Jyenq niab Buv Zauj saaib Dwi.”
42.13: ninb cvj maaib siag taub txn, pua taub sia'q.
42.12: zyruq Zeij fu'q pun yopq setq mweid Eei Nxi tu'q kaub Zamq zinb Daavg Eei Nxib Eia'g. ninb maaib pa'ki yuvb yetg waang pyei Zin taub, lxb Txb Ju'q Zin taub, vovb yetg Zin txij, lxb Eeid yetg Zin taub.
42.15: yem kxmj uaq nxm teib puv lxd maiq tu'q Dovg yopq Eei sia'q Rweig. yopq yaag pun ninb Eei sia'q tu'q Zauj ninb Bua Eei kxj, ninb Bua Eei naud, Ripg ninb Eei Jaab tivb.
42.11: yopq Eei muab txig Zauj zinb Daavg hiuq tu'q ninb uaq teij myenb yetg zuvq taaib lxd ninb yaag yem ninb Eei pyauq Zauj ninb Eang Naavj. ninb Bua yaag weig zyruq pun ninb zu'g x'q Eei yetg zuvq ze'g naang pun Ziv ninb Bua Kxb lyenb ninb yaag xn ninb Eei Hruq. mrud taub myenb pun nxm Eaanb Zauj nxm Jyemb puab Do'g Rcv.
42.10: yopq weig ninb Eei lob kcv txig tauj kauj liud, zyruq cvj pun yopq tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx. zyruq cvj Jaa Tipq pun ninb kaub Zamq zinb Daavg i kruq.

15.18: tovb Zovb mevb myenb kxvq Jiaj, yem ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Ripg Jyenq taaib yaag maiq pivj.
15.8: Tinb huvb Zaavb laavb Eei wig kapq zunq Eei zyavb hog meib haid Eei fai? meib lyrub Jyenq Zovb mevb weig meib kanb lovg fai?
15.33: ninb yaag Navq a'vung Mei maiq kcvb zua'g Eei pyruq pyob Dxtq Revg, yaag Navq ka'lanq Dyavj Eei pyavb Gxi taaib pyob mig a'q.
15.3: ninb lovg maiq maaib eij leid Eei waag fai Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eei waag Jaiq sin fai?
15.32: ninb Eei Nxib Eia'g maiq kcvb Tauj ninb zyrug zu'g winb suv, ninb Eei Gwaab yaag maiq mcv a'q.
15.21: za'kevb! kamb Riaj haig Eei Qiaj yem ninb Eei mnxmb, pcvb xn Eei zyavb hog, Janb za'g zyrug taaib Zaavq a'q.
15.35: ninb Bua Namq Zwrtq x'q sig Navq maaib kub vwaad faauj sin, yuvd Zwrtq penj waaig sig Navq. ninb Bua Eei Hruq liug leid Duaq myenb.”
15.14: “paamb myenb Navq haiq nx ninb Zivj taaib haib Zivb Revg? fai yem msia'q txn Zwrtq seij Eei myenb Navq haiq nx haib penj zruj hxpg Eei myenb?
15.23: ninb yrub Jyenq mivb lxd Eang yaag kxvq, ‘yem haaij maaib Eang hopq?’ ninb hiuq tu'q Mwavj Eei Nxib Eia'g yem ninb Eei puad ka'Len.
15.6: meib kanb Eei Rwib tivg meib zruj txvg, maiq zeid yia. meib kanb Eei Jrub Jruj waag zruj zxvb zevj koj meib.
15.34: maiq Taaib Tinb huvb uaq teij maiq maaib hod txig zeib fun, a'Neiq Kauj Eaanb Mwavj uaq teij Eei Dopg liub yaag xij zu'g trud puaq Qwi.
15.2: “Zovb mevb myenb lovg maiq lamb lovg Eei wrnb zaav tau, yaag pun tov puv Eei Ryaauj pwavq Revg zyavb sin se hxpg Eei fai?
15.20: x'q myenb yem seij zavg Eei yetg zuvq Nxib Eia'g zu'g syrug Kruq. se zeij myenb Eei myenb waaig myenb ziuj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Havb sruj.
15.24: ninb xij zu'g ze'g naang Kwrnj Kruq pun ninb kamb Riaj, yaag hivb Jiaj ninb Navq huvb tiaj liug leid Bx'q Jaaj nx.
15.28: ninb tu'q yem zivb Waav, yem myenb maiq hxpg zu'g yem Eei pyauq, se tivg taaib xij zu'g penj Baav waaig Eei ka'naaib Dwi.
15.7: “meib tovb Zwrtq seij Daavg Eei taaub taub paamb myenb fai? meib Zwrtq seij Daavg Tinb huvb zeij Bov fai?
15.29: ninb zyrug maiq tu'q putq zxib. ninb Eei zinb zxib yaag maiq tu'q yem laub. ninb Eei Jaab tivb maiq tu'q yem teib puv Yaavj.
15.19: (naaiq nxm teib puv Kuvj ninb Bua kanb tu'q Ripg, yaag maiq maaib kanb fivj myenb yavb ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Jiaj.)
15.17: “mwavj yia maa'b! yia xij Buaj meib. yia pwatg Jiaj Eei, yia xij kxvq,
15.31: maiq tuvq pun ninb Kauj maiq lamb lovg Eei haiq Euvg Duaq kanb, weig zu'g maiq lamb lovg Eei xij winb Rwrnj pun ninb.
15.30: myenb pyauj maiq Dutq Mwavj. trud yaag xij puaq Gaai ninb Eei Zunj. Tinb huvb Eei Qiaj yaag xij pyomq ninb mivb mig a'q.
15.27: “weig zu'g ninb Eei Myen Jung haig, ninb Eei Jaaiq penj xb Jung,
15.11: Tinb huvb lovg swrng Eei waag xn meib Eei Hruq. meib haid se maiq kcvb kauj fai?
15.5: weig zu'g meib Eei zwid Faauj meib Eei Rwib kxvq waag, meib yaag kinq lovg kuq kwaij myenb Eei Byetg.
15.9: maaib haiq Euvg meib hiuq, yia Bua maiq hiuq? maaib haiq Euvg meib mevb pc'g, yia Bua maiq mevb pc'g?
15.16: uaq Euvg waaig haig, yruj haig Eei myenb, se hopq zwid txvj uam Eei myenb, kaub fatq maiq haib Zivb Revg.
15.4: mq paag Taaib Tinb huvb uaq Euvg Hruq meib kwavg mig a'q, yaag tavq Jyenq maiq tu'q yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen feib favq Eei Jauq.
15.10: yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj maaib Ba'pyei pc'g Eei myenb Zauj Havb Jeiq koj Eei myenb, zuvq kaub koj meib Eei tia.
15.22: ninb maiq syenj ninb haib yem Mwavj ka'Euad Rwrnj. ninb zuvq xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
15.12: meib weig haiq tiug sweib kanb Eei Hruq, meib Eei mziv weig haiq tiug Zwrtq trud,
15.15: Tinb huvb zuvq maiq puvj Hruq ninb Eei Zivb Revg finb myenb. ziuj Tinb huvb mavg, luvb yaag maiq Zivb Revg.
15.13: pun meib Eei Hruq vcvg Tinb huvb yaag pun naaiq Euvg waag yem meib Eei Rwib Zwrtq?
15.26: zyrug nanq Jyenq hod Eei Txvb paaib vcvg Jyenq pia'g mivb Bx'q ninb.
15.25: weig zu'g ninb Ewrtq puab Jwrnb pun Tinb huvb, yaag vcvg Jyenq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub,

13.18: yia liug leid zyavj yia Eei sig a'q. yia hiuq tu'q zuvq piuj mevb yia maiq txvg.
13.8: meib Bua xij Tevj Tinb huvb uaq puv Rcv fai? meib Bua xij weig ninb lwrnj leid?
13.3: mq paag yia xij Zauj nrnb Jiaj uaq taub kxvq waag, yia xij Zauj Tinb huvb lwrnj leid.
13.21: Toq Lwrtq meib Eei puad leib ko yia, yaag Toq maiq tuvq zruj kamb Riaj Eei sig hc'q yia.
13.14: maiq kunq Navq haiq nx yia xij zruj a'q, yia maiq funj mcvg Eei kxvq.
13.23: yia Eei zwid Zauj zruj txvg Eei sig maaib Bu'ziaj? Toq pun yia hiuq tu'q yia zruj txvg Eei Jauq Zauj yia paamd Eei zwid.
13.6: “ib zang Toq mwavj yia lwrnj Eei Jauq yaag mwavj yia suj Eei waag.
13.2: meib Bua hiuq Eei, yia yaag hiuq. yia maiq kaub aiq meib Bua.
13.20: “Kuvj Toq pun i Euvg yia Navq, yia zyrug maiq pivj meib Eei Myen.
13.24: “meib weig haiq tiug pivj meib Eei Myen, yaag funj yia zruj meib Eei winb wavq?
13.28: “myenb kunq zruj kunq zitg Navq ka'naaib huq, Navq zu'g kcv vaatg waaig Eei lwib hruj.
13.7: meib Bua xij weig Tinb huvb kxvq Jaaq Eei waag fai? meib Bua xij weig ninb kxvb pc'g?
13.19: maaib haiq taub xij koj yia? maaib nx, yia zyrug sekq yaag taig.
13.17: “Toq lovb lovj Eei mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag, yaag pun yia suj Eei waag pia'g meib Eei mnxmb.
13.27: meib zx'q Dyavj kapg Jyenq yia Eei zauj, cvj mavg Jyenq yia Eei tiub tiub Jauq meib yaag tivg zyavj yia Eei zaub penq Zaaiq tu'q Tauj Eei txvj.
13.11: ninb Eei haavb taaub pun meib kamb Riaj, zuvq hc'q meib Bua mau Revg saa'b?
13.5: feij tu'q meib Bua sekq Ria'g Eei. naaiq zyrug penj meib Bua Eei Zovb mevb a'q.
13.9: sij kxvq ninb zaab mavg meib Bua, meib Bua haib tu'q lovj fai? meib Bua haib Duaq Tinb huvb Navq myenb Duaq myenb fai?
13.16: naaiq xij penj yia Eei Fruj en, weig zu'g maiq Taaib Tinb huvb Eei myenb maiq tu'q mivb yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen.
13.4: meib Bua lovg kxvb pc'g Eei waag Raatq Jyenq meib Bua maiq hiuq Eei. meib Bua se Navq maiq lamb lovg Eei Diab sai.
13.10: sij kxvq meib Bua pivj Jyenq Tevj yetg puv, ninb Dovg haaij zuvq xij kxvb hemj meib Bua.
13.22: Tinb huvb aag, kunq heug, yia zyrug tau. fai pun yia kxvq, meib yaag tau yia.
13.12: meib Bua Eei waab Pwij Navq saaiq maiq lamb lovg, meib Bua lwrnj Eei leid Dovg uamb pamg mau nx.
13.15: maiq kunq ninb taij yia, yia Zxg maaib lamb Namq, mq paag yia yaag xij yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen piuj mevb yia Eei Jauq.
13.13: “Toq meib Bua sekq tavb maa'b! yia xij kxvq. Ga'haaq maiq kunq penj haiq Euvg, sweib yia penj a'q.
13.1: “naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig yia Eei mziv tu'q pwatg Jiaj, yia Eei mnxmb tu'q haid Jiaj yaag mevb pc'g.
13.26: meib fiaq Jyenq Niaq haig Eei sig koj yia, cvj pun yia Daamb txv yia lunj Eei zyavb hog zruj Eei zwid.
13.25: meib xij hc'q yetg Kwaaiq zu'g Ryaauj pwrng Eei Dyavb nxmb yaag zung Byaub Gaauq Gaai fai?

1.18: ninb Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, cvj maaib taub pru taaib kxvq, “meib Eei txn sia'q yem ninb Bua Eei tomb kxj Eei pyauq Eang Naavj, hopq a'vung tiuq,
1.8: zyruq naaig saa-taan, “meib samj mavg yia Eei pru yopq Eei fai? yem luvb Diaq maiq maaib yetg laanb myenb Navq ninb zruj Hruq zivj, maiq lamb Gemb txvj. ninb Taaib Tinb huvb yaag simq Gxi, maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig.”
1.3: ninb maaib siag Zin taub pa'ki yuvb, pua Zin taub lxb Txb, Mmd pc'q txij vovb, Mmd pc'q taub lxb Eeid, yaag maaib pru Zamq Eei. peiq yem tov puv Eei yetg zuvq myenb, naaiq taub kaub putq zxib Jiaj.
1.21: yaag kxvq, “yia Fav sin yem yia Eei maa Eei ka'sia Zwrtq, yaag xij zu'g Fav sin Eei Rwrnj.   zyruq Zeij pun Eei,   zyruq cvj syru Rwrnj. xij zu'g Zev zyruq Eei mevb.”
1.14: maaib taub trug fyenj myenb taaib Buaj yopq, “vovb laib Jyenq Deig, lxb yaag yem ka'Len Eang miaq.
1.6: maaib Nxi nx, finb myenb taaib yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen. saa-taan yaag taaib yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.
1.2: ninb maaib siag taub txn, pua taub sia'q.
1.20: yopq zyrug Jiad sin taaib petq ninb Eei lwi, yaag Teij ninb Eei mGxvq, Pua'q Fiag Dau paaij
1.7: zyruq naaig saa-taan, “meib yem haaij taaib?” saa-taan tau zyruq, “yia yrub luvb Diaq mivb mivb taaib taaib, faaub faauj Fiab Fiag.”
1.19: zyrug maaib kxv tomb Ryaaub zung yem teib puvb Waav taaib pwrng pyauq Eei pyei nxm kx'q. pyauq zyrug Baav, Dapq zu'g uaq teij myenb lunj myenb taig Revg mig a'q. Kuvj yia kanb pyauj Dutq taaib Buaj meib Navq.”
1.17: ninb Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, cvj maaib kanb taub taaib kxvq, “Ken-Dia myenb pun Gxi zruj pua kwanb Zaavq lxb Txb txb mivb Revg, yaag lovg Ru'g Daauq taij Revg uaq teij pru. Kuvj zevg yia kanb pyauj Dutq taaib Buaj meib Navq.”
1.11: mq paag Toq suv meib Eei puad mua'q ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq, ninb zyrug txv Jyenq meib zyruj meib a'q.”
1.5: Beng Eang Eei Nxib Eia'g Jiaj liud, yopq Paaiq myenb mivb heug ninb Eei txn Bua saaj Revg wij. ninb luvb Dxm Jiad sin Ryruq Eei, yaag ziuj ninb Bua yetg zuvq myenb Eei sruj mrug fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq. ninb zanb zang Navq naaig zruj weig zu'g ninb kxvq, “Riaj yia Eei naamb Erud paamd zwid, yem Hruq zyruj Tinb huvb.”
1.9: saa-taan tau zyruq, “yopq Taaib Tinb huvb se pc'g pc'g Taaib Eei fai?
1.16: ninb Zxg kxvq Jyenq waag uaq zang, cvj maaib taub myenb taaib kxvq, “Tinb huvb Eei trud yem luvb Fiag taaib puaq pa'ki yuvb kwanb Zauj kruj yuvb kwanb Eei pru Qwi Revg. Kuvj yia kanb pyauj Dutq taaib Buaj meib Navq.”
1.4: Jiaj taaib Eei zyavb hog, ninb Eei txn Tiuq Jyenq yem ninb Bua kanb Eei pyauq, ziuj ninb Bua Eei Nxi Beng Naavj Lo Eei, yaag Paaiq myenb mivb heug ninb Bua Eei pua taub muag taaib Zauj ninb Bua Eang yaag hopq.
1.10: meib peu Jyenq ninb Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb, lyemb puvb puv ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq maiq zeid? meib Zeij fu'q ninb Eei puad zruj Eei kov yaag pun ninb Eei Jaab tivb Yaavj Jyenq faauj Zamq.
1.22: yem naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, yopq maiq paamd zwid yaag maiq kwaij Tinb huvb.
1.12: zyruq kxvq Buaj saa-taan, “uaq Euvg, ninb maaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq se yem meib Eei puab Diaq. Kuvj ninb kanb Eei sin meib maiq tuvq hxig.” saa-taan zyrug yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen mivb a'q.
1.15: lyemb zeib maaib sej-Baa myenb taaib zx'q scvb Kuq Zaavq mivb Revg, yaag lovg Ru'g Daauq taij Revg pru. Kuvj yia kanb tu'q pyauj Zwrtq taaib Buaj meib Navq.”
1.13: maaib Nxi yopq Eei txn sia'q yem ninb Bua Eei tomb kxj Eei pyauq Eang Naavj, hopq a'vung tiuq.
1.1: yem utg teig maaib laanb myenb, Buaj heug yopq. naaiq laanb myenb se Hruq zivj Eei myenb, maiq maaib txvj Gemb. ninb Taaib Tinb huvb, yaag simq Gxi, maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig.

26.3: meib Tevj maiq maaib Zovb mevb Eei myenb Zaavb laavb tu'q lovj haig, yaag pun Ziv meib maaib Lo haig Eei wrnb zaav x'g?
26.8: ninb peu uam yem pwavq Bwrnb hod ka'Euad, uam yaag maiq zruj pun Bwrnj Baaij.
26.9: ninb pun Bwrnj Txvq Jyenq ninb Eei weig, zx'q ninb Eei Bwrnj Zxv taaib pwav Jyenq.
26.7: Tinb huvb zx'q pa'q puv Eei luvb Zxv Kuvj Eei txvj kub vwaaig, yaag zx'q paamb ken Kwavj Jyenq maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eei txvj.
26.5: “yem yemb ken Eei myenb, se yem uamb Diaq Zauj uam ka'Euad Eei myenb Eanb Eanb Eei.
26.14: mq paag naaiq se kxvq teij paaq Tinb huvb Eei Jaub lrug. yia Bua Kuvj haid ti'q tyen waab sapq kxvq Tauj ninb Navq. mq paag ninb Eei tomb Qa'q Bwi Navq Ba'ov nx, haiq taub haib pia'g Hruq?”
26.4: haiq taub Tevj meib kxvq Zwrtq naaiq teij waag? maaib haiq taub tovd zu'g meib Navq naaiq nx kxvq?
26.2: “meib kevb! Tevj yia, tovb maiq maaib Qa'q Eei myenb x'g? meib kevb Fruj tu'q mau haig Eei myenb x'g?
26.6: yemb ken yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen pwatg tu'q Gcvg Eei, zu'g myetg Eei txvj maiq maaib haiq Euvg Txvq.
26.13: ninb pun ninb Eei Ryaauj pwrng luvb Rav, ninb lovg ninb Eei puad Ropq taig syepq Eei tomb naav.
26.12: ninb lovg ninb Eei Qa'q pun Kxiq sekq, yaag lovg ninb Eei wrnb zaav Bx'q hivb laa-hapg.
26.11: ninb hemj luvb Eei Dyrub, ninb Bua zyrug kamb Riaj Eanb Eanb Eei.
26.10: ninb yem uamb ming kwetq Wiv kxmj, yem Fav Zauj Mwavj kapq Eei txvj.

25.3: maaib haiq taub haib saauq tu'q hivb ninb Eei Tinb pcv? ninb Eei Fav Zwrtq taaib maaib haiq taub ninb ziuj maiq Tauj?
25.4: uaq Euvg paamb myenb Navq haiq nx haib yem Tinb huvb Eei Ra'Myen zruj tu'q hxpg? yem msia'q txn Zwrtq seij Eei myenb Navq haiq nx haib Zivb Revg?
25.2: “Tinb huvb maaib Lo Jiaj Eei livg kunq. maang myenb xij zu'g Taaib ninb. ninb yem ninb Lav Eei txvj lyepg pcvb xn.
25.6: uaq Euvg, paamb myenb Kuvj Navq kcvb mau, myenb yaag Navq naavb Ruv, kaub fatq maiq Zivb Revg.”
25.5: ziuj Tinb huvb mavg, lyemb Laaj maiq Fav, Leij yaag maiq Zivb Revg.
